K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145a-1: a'arya s'urya garbha n'a ma ma h'a bee bu lyam s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145a-3: 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145a-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145a-7: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka gnas pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145a-8: gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan grangs med dpag tu med pa dag nas der lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145a-10: brjod du med pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-0: de bzhin du phyogs @145b bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas der 'dus te lhags pa'i nyan thos chen po grangs med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-2: brjod du med bdag gis kyang yongs su bskor cing bdun gyis bltas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-3: de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dir lhags pa brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-7: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-9: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-10: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-12: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po grangs med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-14: brjod du med pa dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i lam gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-15: de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-16: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-23: lto 'phye chen po gzhan dang gzhan grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la gyen du lta zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:145b-24: bcom ldan 'das ring po mi thogs par mthar phyin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu 'byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-3: dbugs rdub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-5: tshangs pa'i gnas pa lung bstan pa ston pa na cang mi smra bar 'khod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-6: thams cad dang ldan pa'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i lam gang bar gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-7: da dung bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi char gyi ston pas tshim par ma gyur nas thal mo dag rab tu sbyar te bcom ldan 'das kho na la blta zhing 'khod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-9: nad pa dag sman pa la lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-10: mun pas khebs pa dag snang ba lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-11: chu bos khyer ba dag chu 'gram du lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-12: sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-13: skyabs la lta bar byed pa bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-14: da ltar mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i lam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146a-16: dbang po brgya byin dag nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag gi bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-0: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang gzhan dag nas mi dang ma yin pa rnams @146b gzhan dang gzhan dag gi bar bcom ldan 'das chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po la lta zhing thal mo rab tu sbyar te cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-1: de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po padma 'bar ba'i dpal zhes bya ba sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-4: chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-5: de nas tshangs pa chen po padma 'bar ba'i dpal stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'dis chos bshad par gsol ba btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-6: ring du gshegs shing myur ba'i rgyun dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-7: zad pa lhur mdzad mi g-yo 'od gsal ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-8: rtogs pa thams cad skyed par mdzad pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-9: khyod gsung rab zhi rgyu skar tshul mkhyen mkhas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-10: dbugs rdub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-11: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-12: srid pa gsum po ji ltar dag 'gyur bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:146b-13: sems can 'gro ba spong bar mdzad pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-1: gcig ldan pa nyid kyi mkhyen mnga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-2: lha mi rnam pa mang po khri dag kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-3: so ma nyi rgal mdzad dge brnyes chu bo rgal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-4: bde 'gro'i mkhyen pa myur dang ldan pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-5: byang chub spyod dang sangs rgyas chos mngon sum //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-6: sems g-yo sems can kha cig 'dod klung lhung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-7: mun pas khebs shing mig dang mi ldan pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-8: sdug bsngal thams cad bcom par gyur lags pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-9: mthos dge bral slob dpon mkhas ldan pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-10: skye bo bral la mi dbang thugs rje skyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-11: mnyam pa'i chos nyan skye ba'i pha rol mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-12: srid pa gcod pa bshad par mdzad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-13: skye rlung pha rol gshegs thub thugs rjes gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-14: blo 'chal skye mang sred pa'i dra ba'i lam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-15: de dag thams cad nyon mongs rtsa ba can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-16: der ni sems can 'khyams 'gyur gcad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-17: gang du sdug bsngal rab zhi dbang drug dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-18: yid kyang zhi 'gyur sred skyon rgyal ba gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-19: sred pa bral ba sred rgyu mi mnga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-20: sems can gdung ba dpal kun bral gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-21: de slad thub pa thugs brtse ba yi rgyus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-22: sred pa yi ni chu klung skem mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147a-23: myur du bde zhing 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-0: chos kyang sred pa @147b gcod pa bshad par gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa padma 'bar ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-2: gang dag sngon chad pha rol phyin; ;spyod pa spyad cing spyod 'gyur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-3: de dag nyan thos chos rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-4: nam yang dga' bar mi bya ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-5: sangs rgyas chos las nyams 'gyur ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-6: ltung ba gnyis pa gzhan med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-7: de ni yang dang yang du yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-8: gnyi gar sems ni 'jug pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-9: khro dang nyan thos chos rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-10: rkyen gyi byang chub 'jug pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-11: chos gsum rnam par spangs pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-12: sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-13: skye gnas bzhi ldan sems can 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-14: sangs rgyas zhing 'dir lhags pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-15: thams cad 'dod pa rten mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-16: thams cad mi sdug thob pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-17: 'di na sems can mkhas pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-18: byang chub mchog gi phyir zhugs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-19: gang blo gzungs dang bzod pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-20: brtson zhing legs par goms byas la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-21: dbang po drug gi sgo bsdams shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-22: skyil mo krung gis dran bzhag nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-23: rang gi spyod yul sa non pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-24: phyi ma'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-25: nor bdun rab tu rdzogs pa'ang yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-26: 'dir ni mi sdug tshul bshad na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:147b-27: kun gzhi gang yin sems can gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-2: ngas ni chos kyi ser sna spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-3: sems can srung phyir ma bshad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-4: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-5: byang chub phyir sems 'dir ma btang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-6: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-7: chos 'di yun ring gnas bya zhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-8: sa 'di yongs su spyad mdzad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-9: sa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-10: de bzhin du ni khyod kyis kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-11: zhing 'di la ni rtse bar byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-12: de bzhin bzod pa dag gis rtses //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-13: bsdams nas yun ring gnas par byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-14: nyan thos theg pa ngas bshad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-15: sems can chags las thar bya zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-16: phung po dag dang khams rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-17: skye mched stong pa ngas bshad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-18: zhi gnas rnam pa bcu gsum dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-19: lhag mthong nga yis bshad bya ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-21: sems can de yis rnam dag 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-22: sems can rnams la snying brtse bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-23: nyan thos rnams kyi bden pa bzhi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-24: chos rnams rtag tu yun gnas dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-25: zag pa med phyir ngas bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-26: nyan thos bden pas 'dul ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-27: srid pa'i mtsho las ngas bsgral lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148a-28: byang chub spyod pa thams cad kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-0: phyi nas khyed @148b la bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-1: de nas de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-2: kye ma da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-3: nyan thos kyi gtam yang dag par rab tu ston par mdzad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-4: theg pa chen po'i gtam ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-6: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-7: kye ma da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa yongs su spyad pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-9: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-10: da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-11: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-20: mi ma yin pa ma dad pa rnams mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-21: dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-22: sems can chos la mngon par brtson pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-23: chos la gnas pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:148b-24: yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-0: tshul khrims kyi dri dang yang @149a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-1: dag par ldan pa rnams bde ba la reg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-2: rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-3: byad grol gyi bde ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-4: ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shin tu yon tan dag gis bsgo bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-5: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan thams cad kyang bsgo ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-6: bla ma la gus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-7: phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur par bya ba'i phyir bdag cag nang du yang dag par 'jog par bzhed pas ma la bdag cag gis nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-8: bdag cag thams cad kyis sa'i steng du skyil mo krung gis 'khod par bya zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-9: rang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-12: rnal 'byor dag gis gnas pa dag tu bya gor ma chag go snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-13: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149a-14: gang dag sa bcu dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-0: gang dag mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas pa'i bar dag @149b dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-1: gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-2: mi 'jigs pa thob pa dag gi bar de dag thams cad sa steng 'dir skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-3: de bzhin du rang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog thams cad kyi bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-5: ting nge 'dzin dag la mnyam par bzhag pa dag tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-6: yang de'i tshe bsod nams kyi stobs ji lta ba bzhin du rgyu mthun pa'i rgyu'i stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam par gzhog pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan byed pa de dag las kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-11: skar mda' dang mnyam pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-13: brgya byin dang mnyam pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-15: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang mnyam pa nas kha cig gi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-16: zla ba dang mnyam pa'i bar dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-17: kha cig gi ni; nyi ma dang mnyam pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-19: nyi ma gcig dang mnyam pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:149b-21: nyi ma gsum dang mnyam pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-0: @150a *// nyi ma lnga dang mnyam pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-2: nyi ma stong dang mnyam pa'i bar dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-4: lus las ni; nyi ma bye ba rgya stong dang mnyam pa'i 'od dag byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-5: mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i snang ba chen po rgya che ba de lta bus 'jig rten khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-6: de dag gi lus las mchog tu sems can gzhan dag gi lus dang sems kyi bde ba la reg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-8: rab tu tshim par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-9: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-10: lta ba ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa; lus kyi gnas ngan len thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-11: bkres pa dang skom pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-12: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-16: 'ching ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'od byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di srid pa gsum gyi btson ra'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa thams cad kyi bar rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-0: de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di sems can thams cad @150b sangs rgyas la 'bab pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-2: dge 'dun gyi yon tan la dga' pa la mkhas pa dag 'khod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-3: yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di phyogs bcu'i gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-4: stong pa ma yin pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-6: yongs su dag pa ma yin pa dag na kun nas lham me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-8: lhang nger yang dag bar snang ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-10: mtshan mo mun pa byung ba na zla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-11: nyi ma brgya stong shar nas lham me; lhan ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-13: de ltar de'i tshe mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang phyogs bcu'i gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-14: stong pa ma yin pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-16: yongs su ma dag pa dag na kun nas mchog tu lham me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-19: de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-20: gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:150b-21: gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151a-0: mi 'jigs pa thob pa'i bar de dag sangs rgyas @151a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151a-1: kyi mthu sa de nas chas te sems kyi skad cig ma gig dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhugs nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin sa steng du skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151a-2: de bzhin du rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la nan tan dag tu byed cing ji ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151a-3: mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen dang ldan pa de dag gi lus las de 'dra ba kho na'i 'od byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas nyan thos chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151a-5: khyed bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthu la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151a-6: byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyus bdud thams cad kyi yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151a-7: klu thams cad kyi yul zil gyis mnan nas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'dir chos kyi tshul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151a-8: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151a-9: gsal bar mdzad pa'i phyir mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad yongs su spyad pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151a-10: de bzhin du da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-0: dpag tu med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsam gtan @151b dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-1: mngon par shes pa'i yul la rnam par rtse ba dang ldan pa dag gis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-2: gsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-11: mi ma yin pa ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-12: dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-13: sems can chos la mngon par brtson pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-14: chos kyis gnas pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-15: yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-16: sems la dbang dang ldan par gyur pa rnams bde ba la reg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-17: rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-18: nga'i bstan pa rab tu mi 'jig par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-19: byang grol gyi bde ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sa chen po 'di yongs su spyad par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:151b-20: don de nyid byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan gyi yul dag gis rnam par rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152a-0: sa phyogs gang dang gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di @152a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152a-1: dag 'khod cing bsam gtan gyi yul dag gis rnam par rtsen par byed pa de dang der da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang kha cig tu la lar nga 'das nas sems can 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag par byed cing mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa dag sku gdung gi mchod rten dag byed du 'jug par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152a-2: sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs khang dag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152a-3: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152a-4: chos kyi bzhugs khang dag byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152a-5: yang na der glegs bam du bri ba byas nas nga'i chos kyi sku'ang 'chang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152a-6: der yang mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang byed par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152a-7: der rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang 'bul bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152a-21: byu ru la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152a-26: yul ka shi'i ras bzang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152a-27: dbu rten nad tshangs can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152b-10: gces par byed pa dag tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyag sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;de dag gi mchod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152b-12: de nas nga nyid kyis bzhes par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152b-13: sems can de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152b-14: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir mi ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152b-21: kun dga'i re ba dag rab tu shom par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152b-22: yang na nyan thos kyi chos kyi gnas pa rnams la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152b-23: rim gro rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste; chos go sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152b-28: yo byad dag gis byed par 'gyur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:152b-32: dgon pa'i gnas de dag tu'ang bkur stir byas te chos nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153a-0: rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i @153a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153a-1: gtam byed pa dag tu 'gyur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153a-2: glegs bam dag klog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153a-4: 'chag sa la sogs pa de dag tu'ang yongs su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153a-18: snod spyad kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag der yongs su gtong bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153a-19: nga'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi gnas pa rnams longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir mal cha dang stan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag sems kyi rgyan gyi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153a-20: sems kyi yo byad kyi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153a-21: rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153a-22: byang grol gyi bde ba don gyi mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir bsngo ba dag tu byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153a-23: da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa la phan gdags pa'i phyir yongs su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongs su gtong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153b-0: de bzhin du sems can de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag @153b thams cad la ci nas kyang sems can de dag 'bras bu chen por 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir nga rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153b-2: sems can log par ltung ba'i chos can ma yin pa ngan 'gor gsum rnam par spangs pa de dag thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir mi ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153b-3: sems can bdag yun ji srid du 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de srid du'ang longs spyod gnyis po chos kyi longs spyod dang zang zing gi longs spyod dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153b-6: shing ljon pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153b-8: nags 'dabs gang du'ang rung ste; da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na thar pa don du gnyer ba chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153b-11: dge bsnyen ma sgra bskyungs pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153b-13: nang du yang dag 'jog gi tshul dang bcas pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153b-14: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang 'tsham pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:153b-17: gnod sbyin dag kyang gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154a-0: dge slong dag gdul ba'i don du bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthu la @154a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154a-2: bdud thams cad kyi yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154a-3: klu thams cad kyi yul zil gyis mnan nas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyis chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154a-4: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir sngon yang mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su spyod pa mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154a-5: da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dpag tu med pa gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154a-9: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154a-10: nam mkha'i mig dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154a-11: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154a-12: chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang nga la snying nye ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-0: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du bsam gtan gyi yul gyis sa steng du 'khod nas bdud thams @154b cad kyi yul tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-1: 'khor bas skrag pa sbyin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-2: da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-4: dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yun ji srid gnas par chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la khyim dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-8: bran mo'i bar gang su dag gis de ltar bsngos pa de la sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba gang dag tha na 'dab ma gcig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-10: me tog gcig cig yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-12: mi blun po de la don ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-13: phan pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-14: de la gnod pa bzhi'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-15: bzhi gang zhe na; phyogs thams cad du mi snyan pa chen po 'gro ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-21: rim gro ba sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dag dang myur du 'bral bar 'gyur ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:154b-22: nad tshabs chen po yun ring ba dag gis thebs par 'gyur ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-1: dang lhung bzed gang yod pa'ang 'jigs pa chen po lngas 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-2: lnga gang dag gis she na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-8: bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba dang lnga po de dag gis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-9: de'i 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-10: bzhi gang dag yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-11: lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-12: de gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas sems can dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa ro skam gyi nang du dud 'gor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-13: yi dvags kyi ris su long ba dang rkang lag med pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-14: de lo brgya stong mang po dag tu bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-15: skom pas yongs su gdung ba chen po'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-16: gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas de dag shi 'phos nas lo brgya stong mang po dag tu sprul gdug pa long ba rdul za ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155a-17: de brgya la res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-0: 'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu mi nyid thob @155b pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-2: tshul du mi shes par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-4: lag pa ma tshangs ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-5: rkang pa ma tshang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-6: khyi'i longs spyod kyi kha zas la gdu zhing skyag khungs sa'i kha zas za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-8: phyag dar khrod na nyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-11: lam po che rnams na 'tsho bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-12: de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-13: de ci'i phyir de'i 'bras bu 'dod pa ma yin pa de ltar lci ba 'byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-14: 'di ltar sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-15: 'di ltar chos kyis gnas pa rnams la khyim dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-19: phyugs dag gi bar bsngos pa dag 'phrog nas gang zag rang gi yongs su longs spyod pas longs spyod par byed pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-20: sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-21: de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul med par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:155b-24: nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-0: de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba nas nub par bya ba'i @156a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-1: bar du brtson pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-4: tshogs dang ldan pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-5: chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang dge ba'i phyogs kyis rab tu phye ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-6: de'i phyir de nyid kyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa lci ba mngon par 'grub pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-7: de nas gnas brtan ga ya 'od srung gis mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-11: rab tu byung nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i slad du log par sgrub pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-16: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-17: gang du de'i sngon gyi las rnams zad pa dag tu 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-19: 'di na gang gzhan du spyod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156a-21: 'on kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig mi nyid thob pa rnyed par dka' ba rnyed de legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156b-0: zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar rmad du @156b byung ba'i rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156b-1: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob nas 'od kyang skyes bu blun po de dag gang gis mchod par mi 'gyur ba dang; bza' btung dang bral bar 'gyur ba mi dge ba'i phyogs rnal 'byor yid la byed pa yongs su bsam nas rgyal rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156b-3: rje'u rigs dang; dmangs rigs dad pa can dag gis khyim dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156b-8: bran mo nas rkang bzhi pa dag gi bar dge slong chos kyis gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156b-9: yon tan gyis phyug pa dag longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156b-10: dge ba'i phyogs dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir te ltar bsngos pa la sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de mang du thos pa'i mthu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156b-11: khyim na gnas pa'i mthus de dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156b-12: nye bar spyod pa 'phrog nas bdag nyid kyis gang zag gi 'du shes kyis yongs su spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:156b-13: skyes bu blun po de'i log par sgrub pa de ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:160b-2: mig ma tshang bar skye bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:160b-4: yongs su dmyal bar byed de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:160b-6: de gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du lus dpag tshad brgya pa'i sha nar nar por skye bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:160b-10: phyogs bzhi kun tu'ang rlung kun tu tsha ba dag gis kun tu sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:160b-11: der yang phyogs bzhi nas ri dvags dang bya dag lhags te yongs su za ba dag tu byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:161b-4: khyim na gnas pa gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:161b-17: rang rgyal ba dag dang bcas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang sems can gcig cig ldan par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:161b-18: sems can de nyan thos dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162a-7: sems can de ches khyad par du 'phags pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162a-8: de gang la sems can 'tsho ba kun gyi nang na nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162a-9: rang rgyal ba thams cad las ches bsod nams dang ldan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162a-10: skyes bu 'ga' zhig 'byung bar bas lags so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162a-14: de la gang sems can 'tsho ba thams cad kyi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162a-19: rkang pa dag rnam par gcod par byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162a-22: skyes bu de bsod nams ma yin pa sdig pa'i las ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162a-23: de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchi ma dag phyung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162b-4: gang sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa de lta bu gcig gi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par bgyid cing mig 'byin pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162b-11: dpe ma mchis pa bskyed par 'gyur ba lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162b-12: gang de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par bgyid cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162b-17: rkang pa dag rnam par gcod pa lta ci smos lags /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162b-21: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho ba'am; yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162b-22: lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos zad par 'gyur ba'i bar du khyim na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:162b-23: rab tu byung ba gang chos kyis gnas pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163a-10: yo byad dag yod pa de las 'phrog gam rku ba de la rgyal rigs btang snyoms par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163a-12: khyim na gnas pa rkun ma de dag chad pa ci yod pa bzhin chad pas gcod du mi 'jug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163a-13: rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163a-14: rgyal rigs ji lta ba bzhin grong gi blar bskos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163a-17: ljongs kyi blar bskos pa'ang de bzhin du btang snyoms par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163a-18: de ltar rku ba'i sems can da dag zlog par mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163a-19: de lta bu'i grong gi bla nas ljongs kyi bla'i bar de bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ches mang du skyed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163a-27: gang yang rgyal po bag ma mchis par gnas shing /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163b-9: thams cad kyang btson rar bcug cing bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis gzir bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163b-10: de la gang sems can thams cad de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan pa dag btson ra de nas yongs su thar par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163b-11: lo brgya tshang bar yang sems can de dag thams cad la chos gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:163b-16: yo byad dag gis rim gro byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:164a-6: bsod nams kyi phung po grangs ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:164a-8: dpag tu ma mchis pa bskyed lags so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:164b-0: dgon @164b pa'i gnas gcig tu ye nyung na'ang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa lnga'i len par gnas gnang ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:164b-10: dgon pa'i gnas gcig tu dge slong brgya stong gi bar gnas par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:164b-11: der yang gandi brdungs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag dang lhan cig tu sman gyi yo byad kyi bar dag la longs spyod par ngas gnang ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:164b-20: bdag la mi bstod pa dag dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:166a-24: gang na rgyal po chen po'i dga' ston nam /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:168b-11: dmangs rigs des sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin dang bcas pa gnas de nas zlog par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:168b-13: dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis gnas par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:168b-17: dmang rigs de bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:168b-19: rnyed pa'i rgyus sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs byed pa lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:168b-20: de'i phyir dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis khro ba bstan par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:168b-23: 'on kyang cang mi smra bar gnas de nas 'gro bar bya zhing dgon pa'i gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:168b-26: ri po'i 'or gzhan gang na sgra gcom chung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:168b-27: nang du yang dag 'jog dang 'tsham pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:168b-28: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang mthun pa der gnas par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:168b-29: yang rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mchim phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-1: slad du sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs bgyid cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-2: dge slong chos kyis gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-3: yon tan gyis phyug po rnams kyang gnas nas mchi bar 'gyur pa'i rgyal rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-8: btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-9: mchog tu nyams pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-10: de'i mi nyid rnyed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-11: rnyed par dka' ba lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-12: 'khor ba na 'khor bar bgyid pa de'i mi nyid rnyed pa'i tha ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa grangs ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-15: dpag tu ma mchis pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas kyang gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi tshig gus par mi nyan pa'i sems can de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-16: ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar bgyi ba 'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-17: mtho ris su gzhag par mi spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-19: sdig pa'i las de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169a-22: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na la lar gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la shin tu dag pa'i rgyal rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169b-1: de dag gi don du dgon pa'i gnas dag byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169b-3: dgon pa'i gnas der yang khyim gyi gzhi nas zhing gi gzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169b-6: kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag gi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169b-7: nye bar spyod pa'i phyir yongs su gtong ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169b-8: de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang phrad par 'gyur ba nas ring por mi thogs par sbyin pa po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169b-11: spyin bdag de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169b-13: nga'i bstan pa la dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169b-19: sna chen po la gtogs pa gang yang rung ba zhig nyes pa dang bcas pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:169b-20: gang dang gang du rgyal po chen po'i dus ston nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-0: dga' ston byung ba der rgyal po chen pos dga' ba dang bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs nyam @170a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-4: skyes bu de khyod kyi mdun du 'dug cing skyed pa dang rtse ba myong bar byed pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-5: dga' ba dang bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnas par byed nus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-9: skyes bu des bdag gi mdun na mchis par yang rngo mi thogs lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-10: skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-13: de bzhin du gang zag gang zhig gang zag gir bran dang bran mo srel bar byed cing khyim gyi gzhi nas zhing gi gzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-14: lug dag gi bar srel bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-15: nga'ang de'i ston pa ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-16: de'ang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-17: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang gnod par byed pa dang bcas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-19: chos kyi gnas pa rnams kyi gnas de ltar bsngos pa dag tu chos dang mthun pas gnas par 'os pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-23: dmangs rigs gang yang sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa de'i don byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170a-24: de nas 'gror mi ster ba'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170b-0: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la'ang gnod pa @170b byed pa dang bcas pa chen po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170b-1: sbyin pa mang po sbyin par byed du zin kyang 'on kyang de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170b-4: bdag la phan par yang dag par rjes su lta bas sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su gnas par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170b-7: lha dang mi thams cad la'ang gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170b-8: phan pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170b-9: log par ltung bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170b-10: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170b-15: dmangs rigs gang zhig dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi chos kyi phyogs la yang dag par gnas par byed cing sdig pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyi phyogs la ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170b-16: de sbyin pa mi sbyin du zin kyang 'on kyang de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170b-17: chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyu'i phyir dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sbyin bdag dam pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:170b-19: dam pa'i chos rjes su srung ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dam pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-0: 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba nas ring po mi thogs par bla na med @171a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-1: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-4: rgyal rigs 'tsham pa khyod kyi lag tu chos kyis gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-5: bstan pa ngas yongs su gtad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-6: lnga brgya pa tha ma la gnas pa'i bar du khyed kyis nga'i chos kyis gnas pa yang dag par zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-7: de'i rkyen gyis nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-8: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-11: zhal ta ba zhes bgyi lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-14: zhal ta bar gdags pas gdags par mdzad pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-17: dge slong gnyis zhal ta bar ngas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-19: gang yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sgom pa'i dgra bcom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171a-20: gang yang dge slong slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171b-0: rgyal po @171b chen po; dge slong 'di gnyis zhal ta ba'i las byed par ngas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171b-1: 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171b-2: le'u bcu gcig pa ste nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u las dam pa'i chos srung ba'i 'dus pa dang po rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171b-3: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang thabs cig tu dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kun tu srung pa'i gtam yang yang dag par rtsom pa mdzad pa de'i tshe de'i dus na shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa gangg'a'i klung gi byem snyed 'das pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gdung ba med pa zhes bya ba yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsampa ka'i mdog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsampa ka'i mdog de'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po zhes bya ba chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:171b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos gyen du rnam par bltas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172a-0: @172a *// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa shar phyogs nas chas shing nub phyogs su 'dong ba dag mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172a-1: de nas gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'dong ba nub phyogs su bltas nas kyang de nas snang ba chen po mthong nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas tsampa ka'i mdog ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172a-3: steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172a-4: dpag tu ma mchis pa shar phyogs nas chas shing nub phyogs su mchi ba dag bdag gis mthong lags so; ;nub phyogs su snang ba chen po'ang bdag gis mthong lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172a-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsampa ka'i mdog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172b-0: nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing @172b tshad med pa gangg'a'i klung gi be ma snyed 'das nas snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172b-2: chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172b-3: chos kyi gnas pa nyid rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir 'dus pa chen po la theg pa gsum rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172b-5: stobs dang mi ldan par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172b-6: chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgred bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172b-7: chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir 'du ba mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172b-8: der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang longs spyad par mdzad nas slar gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:172b-9: yang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173a-0: @173a *// nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par 'dus par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173a-1: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i spyan gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173a-2: tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag bstan kyang da dung 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa dang nam mkha' ma 'dres par gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa gsung ba sh'akya thub pa'i chos bstan pa la ngoms pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba sh'akya thub pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173a-4: nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173a-5: bdud kyi yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173a-6: sems can gyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173b-0: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na pha rol tu phyin pa drug la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i phyir mi ldog pa sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i bar 'khod pa de dag thams cad @173b sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir zhugs par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173b-1: 'dir 'khod nas rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs dang bsam gtan dag gis rnam par spyod par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173b-2: des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po shin tu skal ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173b-4: yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173b-5: dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173b-7: gtong ba dang ldan par sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bzhin gyur cig snyam du dgongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173b-9: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der zhugs pa de dag der 'khod nas rang rang gi ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dge ba'i phyogs kyis bsam gtan dag byed de sgom pa de dag las kha cig gis lus las ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173b-12: 'bru mar gyi mar me bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173b-13: kha cig gi lus las ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173b-14: 'od 'di lta bu'i bar dag byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:173b-16: zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'od bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174a-0: der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du 'dus pa da ltar snang ba chen pos sangs rgyas kyi @174a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174a-1: zhing mi mjed khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174a-2: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lhags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang sngon der ma phyin pa sha stag de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der chas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174a-3: der dong nas kyang skyil mo krung gis 'khod cing rang rang gi bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174a-4: der yang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la de dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174a-6: 'dus pa chen po de la'ang lta bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174a-7: der de dag nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174a-8: klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174a-9: sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags nyan par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174a-11: khyod kyang da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs pas rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174a-12: khyod da mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-0: @174b sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-1: sems can rnams shin tu sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan zhing srid pa'i ltung la btags pa dag yin te; sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nang na'ang bud med gzugs mi sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-2: tshul du mi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-3: mchog tu gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-6: gtsang sbrar spyod pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-8: bden pa ma yin pa'i tshig smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-9: tshangs par spyod par nga rgyal byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-11: mkhas par nga rgyal can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-13: gtong bar nga rgyal can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-15: dad par nga rgyal can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-18: drang po'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-20: phrag dog med pa'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-21: gnod sems dang ldan pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:174b-22: byams par nga rgyal can dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180a-16: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180a-18: mi'am ci'i dbang po'i lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180a-20: shes las skyes kyi dbang po'i lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180a-22: rang sangs rgyas kyi lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180a-24: nyan thos kyi lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180a-26: rgyal rigs kyi lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180a-30: khyim bdag gi lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180a-32: bud med kyi lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180a-38: dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180a-40: yi dvags kyi lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180a-42: sems can dmyal ba'i lus byad du kun tu snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-0: 'khor 'di na gang dag nga dang thabs cig lhan cig tu snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad @180b cing bzhengs par yang mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad khri yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-1: 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig blo g-yo ba dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-2: blo rgyud rnam par mi gnas pa dag kyang yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-6: 'dus pa chen po de la'ang blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de las kyang 'dus pa chen po mnyan par mchog tu 'dod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-8: byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang nga kho na dang thabs cig tu de nyid du 'dong bar 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-9: der de dag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi rgyus bslus par gyur na mi rung zhing der nga'i skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i byed pa 'gro bar gyur na mi rung bas de dag gi don du ngas bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-10: yang de bzhin gshegs pa tsampa ka'i mdog gis byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad cas bka' stsal to; ;rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-13: skyes bu dam pa khyed la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-14: gzungs sngags gang gis srid pa gsum gyi btson rar thams cad du mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:180b-15: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa'i sgo la reg nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-0: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug @181a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-2: mgo mnyam du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i padma zhes bya ba lus kyi tshor ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-3: lus kyi 'du shes thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-4: dul ba'i sa sgrub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-5: rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-6: srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su gcod pa sgrub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-7: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi gegs zlog pa sgrub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-8: byams pa chen po sgrub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-9: snying rje chen po sgrub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-10: shes rab rnam par grol ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-11: bdud bzhi dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba sgrub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-12: zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa sgrub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-16: gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub par byed pa ngas sbyin par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-18: gang la la nyi ma snang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-19: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad srab mor byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181a-20: 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang lha rnams kyi nang du tshe rabs bdun 'khor bar byed cing cher bas dran par yang 'gyur la der 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181b-0: de rnams kyi nang du lha'i drang srong du 'gyur @181b zhing lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181b-1: de de nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams kyi nang du tshe rabs bdun 'khor bar byed cing 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis rjes su gos par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181b-2: 'dir mi rnams kyi nang du mi'i drang srong du 'gyur zhing lha dang mi thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181b-4: gang la la 'dir nyi ma snang ba'i gzungs sngags sems rtse gcig pas lan bdun gyi bar du nyan par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181b-5: de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lha rnams kyi nang du lan bdun gyi bar du drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181b-7: de 'dir mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181b-13: mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181b-16: gang la la lha rnams kyi nang du'ang lha'i 'dus pa rnams la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i padma zhes bya ba 'di lan bdun du rjod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:181b-17: de dag kyang sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-0: lha mo de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po thams cad la mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing bsam gtan la mngon par @182a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-2: gal te la la 'dir rgyal po rnams sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-6: dmangs rigs rnams kyi rna khung du lan bdun du rjod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-7: gal te de dag kyang sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-8: de dag thams cad 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po thams cad la mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-9: bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-11: bud med gang la la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i padma zhes bya ba 'di nyan par byed cing nyin zhag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par rnam par sems par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-12: lces kha ton du byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-13: de'i ris mthun pa la 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-15: de'i bud med thob pa'i tha ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-16: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182a-17: de phyis kyang bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe bud med thob pa rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-0: gang la la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i padma zhes bya ba 'dis lan bdun du rtsi grang mo las byabs nas rnga bo che'am dung la byugs @182b nas rnga bo che de rdung bar byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-2: gang dang gang du de dag gi sgra 'gro ba de dang der mi rnams la byad stems thams cad kyi rgyu med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-3: der sman gyi sbyor ba 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-11: snying gi kun tu gdung ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-12: las sgrub pa med par 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-14: gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i padma zhes bya ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-15: de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-19: ae le ke te re she /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-23: aun ma da aun mad te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-25: ra ga dhu ra ga dhu pa pra ti she dha ne bindu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-27: tsi ta tsi ta pra ti she dha ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-29: ha ta tsid ti ha ta ni rmi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-30: ha ta k'a ma be ge /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-31: ha ta poo na bha bi ra dze /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-32: ha ta tsakshu sa ma te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-33: ha ta pi ta ma buddhe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-35: ha ta bi sa ma gre /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-36: ha ta sa mu dra tsa be /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-37: ha ta bi ta m'a ra dze /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-39: ha ta dhamra tsa tsa te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-41: ha ta ba hu r'a dze /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-42: ha ta pa bardza ma ti /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-45: ha ta sarba au ba dha na dzny'a dzny'a dzny'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:182b-49: ae sha aanta sam s'a ra du: khe sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-0: 'dod pa'i chu bo thams cad kun tu skem par byed pa nges par 'byung @183a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-1: ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i gzungs sngags 'di bzung nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-2: khyod kyis 'dod pa'i bdud kyi mchil ba thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-4: yul la brtson pa'i pha rol gnon pas pha rol gnon pa byed du zin kyang sus kyang khyod kyi lus sam sems la 'dod pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dag gis gos par byed mi nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-5: gzungs sngags 'di ltar thos pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du song nas kyang sbyor ba byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-6: der gal te bdud bye ba phrag brgya gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-7: sman gyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-8: chos kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-10: mi gzhan dag gis 'dod pa'i dri nga ba dag gis gos par bya ba lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-11: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-12: lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-14: mi rnams ngo mtshar rnyed cing rmad du byung ba rnyed par gyur nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gzigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183a-18: mchog tu ngo mtshar lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-0: @183b 'dod pas kun tu gdung ba rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-1: bdag cag gis sngon ma thos lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-2: de nas 'khor der lha'i bu mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-3: mi'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bsnyen bkur byas nas gzungs sngags 'di thos par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-4: thos ma thag tu de dag gi mo mtshan nub par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-5: pho mtshan byung bar gyur te thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsampa ka'i mdog gis me tog tsampa ka'i phreng ba bzhes te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-8: me tog tsampa ka'i phreng ba 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-9: gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i padma zhes bya ba 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-10: bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa de zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-11: 'dod pa glog gi 'od lta bu sel bar byed pa 'di gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-12: chos kyi sgo mo der khyer la nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-14: stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-15: de la 'di skad du khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa tsampa ka'i mdog zhu bar mdzad lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:183b-17: ci snyung ba mi mnga' lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-1: khyod kyi 'khor gus par nyan lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-3: chos kyis gnas pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-4: chos la brtson pa lags sam; sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad na nyon mongs pa sel bar bgyid pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-5: chos kyi sgo la de bzhin gshegs pa des dad pa stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-6: de nas 'dod pa glog gi 'od lta bu sel bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-7: chos kyi sgo'i gzungs sngags mthu stobs che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-9: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-10: gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa nas ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-11: sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa bskur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-13: 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-18: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khris tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184a-24: 'dus pa chen po de la'ang blta ba'i slad du bdag cag kyang mchi bar mtshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184b-0: de bzhin @184b gshegs pa de las 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad na nyon mongs pa sel bar bgyid pa'i chos kyi sgo bdag cag gis mnyan par bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsampa ka'i mdog des de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184b-2: rigs kyi bu dag thams cad lhan cig mthun par thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184b-7: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184b-11: spyod lam du lus dag mngon par sprul nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsampa ka'i mdog gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nas chas te yud tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184b-12: skyes bu dam pa de dag phyin pa tsam gyi mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me me tog tsampa ka'i char mngon par 'bebs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:184b-13: de dag yul ma ga dha'i zhing ga la ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der nye bar @185a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185a-2: dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185a-4: de'i bar du'ang rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang thabs cig chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam kun tu spyod par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185a-5: de'i tshe lho phyogs na grong khyer chu dang rgyar dpag tshad gcig yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185a-6: bye ma dag gis yongs su gang ba de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma lngas snyigs ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185a-8: 'khor der yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185a-9: des steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa lho phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas byang phyogs su 'gro ba dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185a-10: de nas gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dong ba'i phyogs de la bltas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185a-11: des der snang ba chen po mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po la yongs su zhus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-0: zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' @185b sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-1: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-4: grong khyer chu dang rgyar dpag tshad gcig yod pa; bye ma dag gis yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i bye ma'i 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-6: de na da lta 'dus pa chen po yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa de chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-8: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-9: chos kyis gnas pa nyid rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-10: bdud kyi yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-11: chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar mdzad pa'i phyir theg pa gsum rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad nas gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:185b-13: zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-0: nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par 'dus par mdzad nas so so yang @186a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-1: dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i spyan gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-2: tshangs pa'i gnas dag bstan kyang da dung 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed sa dang steng gi nam mkha' ma 'dres par gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu snyan pa gsung pa sh'akya thub pa'i chos bstan pa la ngoms pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-3: zhes bya ba'i bar ji skad sngar gsungs pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-5: khyod nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la zhu ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi khams su 'gro bar spro na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-6: der nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la ngas dad pa sbyin par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-7: der stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu stobs che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-9: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-10: gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-11: gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-14: nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas zad pa shes pa skyed pa'i bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186a-15: mi skye ba shes pa rtogs par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-0: ma rig @186b pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-1: sdug bsngal gyi khur thams cad 'dor bar byed pa 'di bskur bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-6: pra bh'a sa dhu ma te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-7: sarb'a k'a sha dhu ma te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-8: aa ba b'i ksha kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-10: aa ba mo ha kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-12: by'a ba brid ti kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-13: aa ro tsa na kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-17: bi ti mi ra kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-32: r'u pa dh'a tu kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-33: tsakshurbi dzny'a na dh'a tu kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-34: y'a pa da ma na dh'a tu kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-36: ma na bi dzny'a na dh'a tu kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-37: pri thv'i dh'a tu kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-38: aa ba dh'a tu kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-39: te dzo dh'a tu kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-40: b'a yu dh'a tu kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-41: tsa tur aa nu smri tyu pa sth'a na kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-42: ya b'a dha be ni ka kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-49: sarba sam ska ra bi she sha nan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-53: ai ai ai ai li mi le sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:186b-55: stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187a-0: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed @187a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187a-2: gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa'i bar yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187a-3: longs la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187a-4: nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bya ba nas gang la las ngas rgyas kyi yul 'dir chos ma lags pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po des nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187a-5: sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa stsol bar mdzad cing zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187a-6: de nas kyang stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu stobs che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187a-8: gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal gyi khur thams cad 'dor bar byed pa 'di bskur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187a-9: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187a-12: stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags kyi yon tan gyi phan yon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-0: stong pa @187b nyid kyi phan yon bdag gis bzung lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der mchi ba la bdag 'jigs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-4: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-5: da ltar bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mngon du thos shing mngon du bzung lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-6: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems can rnams mchog tu 'dod chags kyi shas che ba zhes bgyi ba nas bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-8: sems can dmyal ba ba byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bar gyi slad du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-10: nam mkha' la rkyen gsum yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-11: gsum gyis khyab pas rnam par mdzes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-13: gdung bar mi byed do; ;chu klung dag la chu skam par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-14: rkyen gsum pa dag la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-16: bsdams pas lus khyab pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-17: lung gis ma rig pa'i chu bos kyang dbang po drug gdung bar mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:187b-19: rkyen gsum gyis chu bo dag las thar par byed cing sems can med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188a-0: phung po'i khur 'dor ba'i chos ston par byed @188a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188a-1: do; ;khyod kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rnam pa bcu gsum rab tu bsgoms pa yin zhing 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188a-5: khyod tshangs pa'i lus byad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na sems can rnams thar par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188a-19: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188a-22: rgyal rigs kyi lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188a-23: de bzhin du kha cig tu ni; bram ze'i lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188a-25: nyan thos kyi lus byad dang zhes bya ba nas kha cig tu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188a-26: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang por blon po'i bar gyi lus byad du kun tu snang bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188a-27: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can dag tu dus rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188a-28: ci ste sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i don du 'jigs pa'i tshig smra bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188a-30: khyod la mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa zhes bya ba sems kyi tshor ba sgrub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-0: thams cad @188b mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'du ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-1: bdud bzhi 'dul bar byed pa sgrub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-2: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi gegs med par sgrub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-3: klu'i yul thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i 'od zer sgrub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-4: sems can rnams kyi las thams cad zad par 'gyur ba sgrub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-6: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrub pa; snying rje chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-7: bsam bzhin du ngan 'gror skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-8: sems can yongs su skyob pa sgrub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-9: sems can thams cad kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa sgrub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-10: sems can thams cad kyi lam ngan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-14: theg pa ngan pa phyir ldog par byed pa sgrub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:188b-15: sems can thams cad ngan 'gro las nge par rnam par thar par byed pa sgrub pa /
