K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-9: bdud rnams tshar gcod par byed cing nyon mongs pa rnams pham par byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-10: lha rnams dga' bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-11: gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-12: lha ma yin rnam par 'joms par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-13: nam mkha' lding rnams dngang bar byed pa; mi'am ci rnams dad par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-14: lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-20: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-21: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-23: nad thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-30: reg par dka' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-31: chos thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul 'bar bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:213b-32: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ston par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-0: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun @214a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-2: 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-3: zad pa shes pa skyed par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-4: mi skye ba shes pa rang gi mngon sum du byed pa; ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-5: sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-6: rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-22: n'a ta n'a ta; ba ri ka n'a ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-26: tsa ba ba ra n'a ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-27: kha gha ma bha n'a ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-31: shi ri ku sa kloo n'a ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-32: ta la ma ru ta kha ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-33: te hu ksha ba ti raksha d'a ma ra dzu ba ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-34: na bu ti sa na ti ra na dza ga aa mo ho ra ga dza la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-41: ae sha ae banto du: kha sya sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-42: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor der srog chags bye ba phrag drug cu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-43: rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-44: dkrigs pa phrag drug cu dag kyang skyon med pa la zhugs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214a-46: rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la ngas khyod kyi lag nas bskur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214b-0: der @214b yang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la nga dad pa sbyin par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214b-1: rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba 'di longs la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214b-2: nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214b-4: bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhus shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214b-5: 'di skad du byang phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa sgra thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhu ba'i slad du bdag mngags pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214b-9: ci snyung ba mi mnga' lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214b-11: khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba dag ma mchis lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214b-12: gnod pa dag chung lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:214b-13: dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215a-0: ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags @215a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215a-1: sam; chos kyi gnas pa dag gis gnas par bgyid pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215a-2: khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215a-4: khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig bu lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215a-5: 'di na thogs pa ma mchis pa chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215a-6: gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa de dag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des 'dir nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags la dad pa stsol bar mdzad cing de nas rig pa chen po yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po mthu che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215a-7: phan yon che ba 'di bskur lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215a-8: sems can thams cad la phan par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215a-9: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215a-10: nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba'i bar rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di [?] bskur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215a-12: de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar thob cing rmad du byung ba thob nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-0: sangs rgyas @215b bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad la ma thogs pa'i ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-4: de lta lags pas da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sngon ma thos pa 'di ltar zab pa'i rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa 'di kho na bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-5: gang la yon tan 'di lta bu grangs med dpag tu med pa de dag mchis pa 'di la mkhas pa byang chub tshol bar byed pa su zhig mngon par brtson par mi bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-7: sems can gang su dag 'khor bas skrag cing byad grol gyi bde ba mngon par 'tshal ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-9: rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags kyi ming bsgrags pa na dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-11: gus par sems can rnams kyi rnyed pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-12: dge ba'i phyogs rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-16: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:215b-18: nga byang chub sems dpar gyur te brtson pa 'dis spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam 'di lta bu btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216a-0: bdag byang chub thob nas sems can gang su dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi @216a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216a-1: zhing thams cad na sbyin pa la brtson pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba nas shes rab la brtson pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba'i bar dag gis bdag gi ming sgrog par byed cing sems can thams cad kyis sems par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216a-2: gal te de dag la lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sems can la la pha rol tu phyin pa de dang de dag gi bar chad byed par nus pa zhig yod na sems can de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba brgya stong du mar gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216a-11: sman dang gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216a-12: lus kun tu 'khrug par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216b-0: sems kun tu 'khrug par byed dam zhes bya ba nas btsas pa tsam gyi bar la'ang tha na yud tsam gcig tsam yang @216b rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216b-1: bdag re zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshan rgya bar ma gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216b-5: dang pas bdag gis ming yongs su sgrog par byed pa thams cad sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216b-14: de na sems can rnams mchog tu sdang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216b-21: log par lta ba dag lags pas der kha cig gis bdag la rnam par mtho brtsams na mi rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216b-22: bdag mchis pas ci la'ang mi sman lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:216b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217a-0: gnas ma yin zhing go skabs @217a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217a-1: med de; sus dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa legs par bsgoms shing legs par yid la byas par gyur pa de la ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217a-3: bar chad byed par nus pa 'di ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217a-26: ha ba he na r'a dza ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217a-28: ksh'anti mi tre; mi tra rla me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217a-33: dhi ti sha ra mi tre sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217a-35: sdang ba zhi bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217a-36: rmongs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs sngags 'dis tsampa ka'i 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas lag pa gnyis bskus na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217b-4: bdud bye ba brgya stong yang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217b-5: sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gis ci'ang byed par mi nus so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217b-7: gal te chu rnyog pa can gyis rgya mtsho bzhi yongs su gang bar gyur kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217b-8: skyor chu gcig kho nas rab tu dang bar byed de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217b-16: 'dus pa chen po blta ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217b-19: gal te der bdag kyang mchir gnang ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:217b-20: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du bdag cag mchi lags so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218a-0: khyed thams cad so so nas gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los bsgyur @218a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218a-5: spyod lam gyis lhan cig mthun par dengs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu de dag thams cad gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218a-10: spyod lam mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas nam mkha' la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang rin po che las byas pa'i padma 'dab ma stong pa bdun bdun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218a-12: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'ang mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218a-13: spyod lam de lta bus de nas chas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218a-14: de dag thams cad skad cig thang gcig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir 'khod de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218b-8: mu tig gi do shal dag mngon par rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218b-10: dpung rgyan gyi rgyan dag mngon par rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218b-16: ba dan gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218b-17: de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218b-18: theg pa chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218b-19: pho nya'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218b-20: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos sngon ma mthong ba tshangs pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218b-23: gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba grangs med dpag tu med pa mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te stan las langs nas ha cang yang thag mi ring bar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218b-24: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi pho nya bzhi po de dag 'khor dang bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:218b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs @219a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-1: kyi snying pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ga la ba de logs su me tog tsampa ka'i phreng ba dag gtor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-2: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-3: rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i snang ba 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-4: lta ba nyams pa'i 'gro ba'i lam stsal pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-5: mnyam nyid ldan pa 'gro la phan mdzad khyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-6: bdud dang klu rnams myur du 'dul mdzad khyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-7: gdul dka' 'gro ba nyon mongs thar mdzad khyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-8: chos 'dir snang ba yun ring 'bar mdzad khyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-9: bsam gtan sgo 'di dag gis skyes mchog ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-10: zhing mang thams cad shin tu mdzes par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-11: rgyal ba skyes mchog skye bo mkhas rgu la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-12: rgyang ring nas ni zhing 'di brjod pa mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-13: 'gro ba'i chos kyi dus 'di dka' ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-14: de mthong bdag 'dir chos ched tshogs su mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-15: 'gro ba mir skye ba ni rnyed par dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-16: shin tu ring nas mir skye rnyed nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-17: nyon mongs chen pos zin gyur thub khyod ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-18: rab myur nyon mongs dra ba gcod mdzad lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-19: sdug bsngal mtsho dang nyon mongs klung lhung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-20: khyod kyis glang chen lta bur 'gro ba bsgral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-21: rgyal bas phan tshun bdag cag pho nyar mngags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219a-22: khyod kyis chos kyi gter la yi rang mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-0: shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na @219b 'jig rten gyi khams ma dros pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag 'dir mngags lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-5: stobs dang bde ba la reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-7: ci snyung ba mi mnga' lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-9: khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-11: chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-12: ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-13: chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-14: khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang klu'i yul bcom lags sam; khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:219b-15: 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par 'khor lo bskor lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-0: sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di na gang su dag 'khor lo @220a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-1: bskor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa tsampa ka'i mdog de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul 'jig pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-2: de nas bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-4: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-5: gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-6: gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-9: nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zad par bgyid pa 'di'ang bskur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-10: zhes bya ba ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-11: bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-14: lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-15: gnod sbyin rnams tshim par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-16: lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-17: rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-18: dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220a-21: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220b-2: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220b-14: chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220b-15: chos kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220b-16: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ston par bgyid pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220b-18: zad pa shes pa skyed par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:220b-19: mi skye ba shes pa rtogs par bgyid pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:221a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:221a-31: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas kyang legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:221a-33: bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:221a-35: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:221a-37: 'dir nga stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:221b-0: lhag chad med pa'i bden pa dang rjes su @221b mthun pa'i bzod pa rgya cher ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:221b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa tsampa ka'i mdog gis gang khyod 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i phyir byin pa lus kyi khyad par thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba nas shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i bar nyi ma'i spyan padma'i sbu gu'i gzungs sngags de khyod kyis kyang ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:221b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:221b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa tsampa ka'i mdog des bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe bsrung ba'i slad du nyi ma'i spyan padma'i gzungs sngags stsal pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:221b-44: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-1: nyi ma'i snying po'i spyan padma'i gzungs sngags 'di zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-4: de bas kyang nyi ma'i spyan padma'i gzungs sngags 'di ches rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-8: gang gis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab bam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-9: rgya mtsho chen po'i yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-12: nyi ma'i spyan padma'i gzungs sngags 'di'i yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-15: bskal pa las lhag par yang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-17: nyi ma'i spyan padma'i gzungs sngags 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-18: de ltar zab pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-20: khyod kyis nyi ma'i spyan padma'i gzungs sngags 'di zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-22: 'khor bzhi po de dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-23: der sems can rnams 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-24: zhes bya ba nas zag pa thams cad zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-25: byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-26: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222a-27: shing gi rgyal po'i drung du bdud ni gcig pu khyod kyis bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-0: byang chub rab mchog dam pa yang ni gcig pus @222b brnyes pa lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-1: lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin gcig pu khyod kyis dbang du mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-2: rgyal ba nyi ma rab grol ye shes mchog gi 'od zer lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-3: 'di na mu stegs gzhan ni gcig pus 'od dang bral mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-4: 'jig rten kun na srin bu me khyer dag la nyi ltar mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-5: thub pa 'dus na sems can bsgral ba'i don kyang mdzad lags te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-6: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang chos tshul yun ring gnas par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-7: khyod gcig bu la mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-8: dge dang byang chub yongs su btsal phyir chos don gnyer ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-9: rgyal ba khyod ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i chos ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-10: khyod ni ye shes byang chub spyod pa rab mchog ston par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-11: gcig pus zhi 'gyur bdud rtsis sems can rnams kyang zhi mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-12: yang srid ma mchis mdzad slad srog chags khrag khrig sgrol ba khyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-13: zag pa zad cing lta dang bral ba nyon mongs spungs gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-14: gang na mya ngan byed med zhi ba'i grong khyer gshegs pa khyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-15: 'di ni 'jig rten kun tu khyod gcig sman dang mtshungs lags te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-16: rgyal ba rnams kyi khyod la zhu ba'i slad du pho nyar mngags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:222b-17: rig pa'i rgya mtsho thugs rje mnyam pas gnas par mdzad pa po //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-4: rig sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di'i mtha' ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-5: bskal pa brgya stong gis kyang brjod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-6: rig sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-7: de ltar zab pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-9: khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-11: 'khor bzhi po dag la'ang rgyas par ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-12: yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-13: de thos pas kyang sems can de dag gi srad pa chung du dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-15: chen po sred pa'i rgyu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-16: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-17: bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:228b-18: bud med mtshams med pa byed pa'i las kyi sgrib pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams zad par 'gyur zhing lhag ma med pa'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-2: byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-3: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-4: khyod ni ded dpon gcig pu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-5: chos rnams kun la des pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-6: mthong ba'i gus pa skyes pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-7: bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-8: me tog gcig dang bdug pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-9: de bzhin gshegs la mchod bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-10: yan lag kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-11: bshes gnyen sdug pa nye bar 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-12: tshogs ni chen po bsdus pa yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-13: dus gcig tu ni 'dir mdzad pas; ;lha rnams thams cad bsngags bgyid cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-14: bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-15: der ni 'jig rten mgon po yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-16: 'di ni lan gcig kho na bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-17: rtag tu lha min shes rab ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-18: bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-19: dpal gyi me tog snying po ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-20: dpal rnams kun gyis kun tu brgyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-21: de yis sh'akya'i dpal zhu bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229a-22: bdag cag pho nyar mngags pa lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229b-0: byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing @229b gangg'a'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das nas snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags lag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dang ba sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229b-6: bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229b-7: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci snyung ba mi mnga' lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229b-9: khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229b-11: dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal pa dag lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229b-12: ji ltar chos rjes su thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:229b-13: chos kyi gnas pas gnas pas bgyid pa dag lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-0: khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud @230a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-3: khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-4: 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gang du dag 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-6: de nas zhi ba rig pa mchis pa'i spubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-10: nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-11: phung po dang skye mched thams cad yongs su shes par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-12: chos thams cad rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-13: thabs thams cad yang dag par ston par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-14: byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su myong bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-15: sems can thams cad rab tu dad par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230a-16: chos thams cad kyi bde ba la 'jug par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-0: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba @230b thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-1: bdud kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa 'di'ang bskur lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-2: rig pa mchis pa'i spubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-3: bdud rnams tshar gcod par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-4: phas kyi rgol ba rnams pham par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-5: lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-6: gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-7: lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-8: nam mkha' lding rnams yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-9: mi'am ci rnams dad par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-10: lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-11: phas kyi rgol ba rnams 'dul bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-12: rgyal rigs rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-13: bram ze rnams 'jug par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-14: rje'u rigs rnams rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-15: dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-16: bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-17: bud med sbru ma pa bde legs su yongs su thar bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-18: mang du thos pa rnams dran par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-19: rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-20: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:230b-27: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-10: chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-12: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-13: 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-14: zad pa shes pa bskyed par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-15: mi skye ba shes pa rang gi mngon sum du bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-16: mun pa'i phung po rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-17: sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-20: ma n'a ksha aa n'a ksha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-27: na da ra ra hu bi sa n'a ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-29: a'a ta n'a ta ku n'a ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-30: pa ri ku sa n'a ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-37: tsa ba ma bha n'a ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-38: kha ga ma bha n'a ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-40: hi sa du dr'a n'a ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-41: sa ma la ya n'a ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-42: shi ra ku ma ra koo ta ta ma tu gu ra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-48: ma ho ra ga dza la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-51: aa tri n'a na ba; aa tri n'a ksha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-52: aa ba ha m'a rga tra n'a ksha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231a-53: ae sho na too du: kha bha ra sya sv'a h'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying pos rig pa mchis pa spubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po mthu che ba phan yon che ba 'di 'dir bskur ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231b-4: bsam gtan la brtson pa rnams ma gtogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du lhags pa'i sems can thams cad dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231b-8: nga stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la rig pa yod pa'i spubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags don dang bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231b-10: lhag chad med pa 'di rgya cher ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des gang khyod chas pa'i dus kyi tshe gsang sngags gang dag gis sdang ba thams cad dad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags sdang bzhi bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231b-13: gnyid kyis log par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231b-14: dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu mthun pa byin pa de khyod kyis kyang ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:231b-16: de bzhin du bstan par bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-0: bo pri he bu bu ra ta la ra @232a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-1: ra ba ai la sa ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-3: ga ga n'a ksha sha ma mi tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-4: tsakra barti ti li s'a ga ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-5: ti le d'u na hi le /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-16: ma na ba ru mi tre /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-17: dha nas shva ra mi tre sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-18: kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos sdang ba zhi bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-19: gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sdang ba'i sprul thams cad rang gi gnas su dong nas gnyid kyis log par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-20: gang dag bzod pa thob pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-23: srid pa na gang dag sdang ba'i gnod sbyin rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-24: gang dag sdang ba'i lha ma yin rnams dang zhes bya ba nas sdang ba'i nam mkha' lding rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-25: sdang ba'i mi 'am ci rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-26: yi dvags rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-27: sha za rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-28: srul po rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232a-29: gang dag sdang ba'i lus srul po rnams zhes bya ba'i bar de dag rang rang gi gnas su dong nas gnyid kyis log par gyur te byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232b-0: phyir @232b mi ldog pa rnams ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232b-5: phan tshun mi mthun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232b-6: rtag tu khro ba spyod pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232b-16: mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:232b-17: chos la dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-6: sems can gang dag nyan par byed pa de dag kyang thos pa tsam gyis yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-7: phan yon mang po thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-8: khro ba mang po mi 'dod pa myong bar 'gyur ba las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnams med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-10: 'khor ba'i skyon mang po rnam par shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po skyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-12: bsod nams mang po so sor 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-13: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po la sten par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-17: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-20: chos kyi mar me 'bar bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-21: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-22: 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-23: gzungs sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:233b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pho nya bzhi po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @234a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-1: po gzhan dag la'ang bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyis gnas par byos shig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'khor dang bcas te gnas ji lta ba bzhin du skyil mo krung gis 'khod nas ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bzod pa'i gzungs la snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu bsgoms pa dag gis snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-4: snyoms par zhugs pa de dag kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-6: 'bru mar gyi mar me bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-9: zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba brgya stong gi 'od bzhin pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-10: de'ang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koo di n+yas 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-11: sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag gis zhu ba ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa gzungs sngags bzhi po thams cad rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du ji ltar lhags pa'i sems can nyan par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-13: the tshom thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-14: chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234a-15: ltad mo dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-0: som @234b nyid las rgal cing the tshom las rgal bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-1: myur du skyon med par 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-2: log par mi ltung ba'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-3: mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ba de lta bur zhu par bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koo di n+yas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas cad mi smra bar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koo di n+ya la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-7: ci de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod zhu ba zhu bar 'dod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-11: btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-14: gal te zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du bdag la skabs phye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-15: bcun pa de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag zhu ba 'ga' zhig zhu lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyod gang dang gang 'dod pa zhus shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-19: ngas zhu ba zhus pa de dang de lung bstan pas ji ltar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mngon sum du 'gyur ba ltar khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:234b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koo di n+yas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-0: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag @235a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-6: ji tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang zag gi zla sred pa lags par 'dogs pas 'dogs par mdzad lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-7: ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu'i zla sred pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-8: yun ring por yang dang yang 'khor zhing yang dang yang mngal len par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-12: gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-13: skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing dus dang 'tsham par zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-15: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-18: zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koo di n+yas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-21: sred pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235a-27: 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-0: gsum @235b ste; 'byung ba'i sred pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-4: de la 'dod pa'i sred pa rnams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-5: 'dod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-6: 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i sprod pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-7: gang la bag med pa rnams 'dod pa'i bde ba'i sbyor ba la brtson zhing dman pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi dag dga' bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-8: sems can rnams 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas gdungs nas 'dod chags kun 'byung bas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-9: rgyu de dang rkyen des sems can dmyal ba rnams snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-12: gnod sbyin dbul po nyid snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-13: 'dod chags kyi rgyus sems can rnams 'gro ba lnga dang ldan pa'i 'khor bar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzad pa rtsub pa rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-15: de dag ngo tsha shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-16: khrel yod pa spangs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral bas brgya lam na res 'ga' mi nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-17: de dag 'dod chags kyi rgyus yang dang yang du lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:235b-19: yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba nas mtshams med pa'i las rnams zhes bya ba'i bar kun nas slong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-0: de dag yang dang yang du dus yun ring @236a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-1: bor ngan song rnams su tshor ba rtsub pa mi bzad pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-2: thams cad kyang 'dod chags kyi rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-3: 'dod chags kyi gzhis 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal gyi ltung ba brtags pa dag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-4: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir chos ston to /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-5: 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-6: sems can de dag 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs shes nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-10: kim pa ka'i 'bras bu lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-12: me mdag gi phung po lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-13: dug gi bum pa lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-15: mnam phyi sa dang 'dra ba dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-17: spu gri'i so lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-18: chom rkun lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-19: gdol ba'i khyim lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-20: lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-21: ser ba 'bab pa lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-22: sbrul gdug pa lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-24: dgon pa'i lam lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-25: srin mo'i gling lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-26: gshed ma lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-27: phyag dar lta bu dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236a-29: dur khrod lta bu dag tu shes shing 'dod pa la chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-1: 'dod pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-3: 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-4: de la 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs su shes pas skyo zhing chos kyi bsam pa sgom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-5: bslab pa 'dzin pa la mngon par dga' bas gnas par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-6: chos yongs su tshol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-7: chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-8: chos kyi nor bsags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-9: chos kyi sems rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-10: chos kyi lam dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-11: chos la gzhol ba dag tu 'gyur ro; ;de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe chos rjes su dran zhing chos kyi ro'i rnam par smin pa chos kyis brlan pa'i sems kyis gnas pa de dag gang dang gang du rnam par lta bar byed pa de dang der phyogs thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa tshogs chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-13: de dag chos de thos pas kyang yid mchog tu rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-15: de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song spangs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa ma yin pa rnams su skye ba dag tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:236b-16: der de dag yon tan gyis phyug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237a-0: yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' @237a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237a-1: zhing bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa byang grol gyi bde ba phun sum tshogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237a-3: snying rje chen pos brgyan pa; sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237a-4: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyis rnam par brgyan pa rnams dang lhan cig 'phrad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237a-5: der de dag dang lhan cig phrad pas de dag gi bag chags kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237a-6: der de dag yon tan de lta bu dag gis kyang shin tu brgyan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237a-8: za ma tog la lar spos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dag bcug par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237a-9: za ma tog der yang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dag bzhag par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237a-10: ring po ma thogs par de dag gi dri ci 'dra bar gos dang rgyan de dag kyang de 'dra ba'i dri rab tu 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237a-11: ring po mi thogs par spos kyi rnam pa de dag gis gos par yang 'gyur la kha dog tu nye bar 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237a-13: de bzhin du sems can gang dag 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs su shes pas zhes bya ba nas de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong zhing de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song gsum spangs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa ma yin pa rnams su skye ba dag tu @237b 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-2: der de dag yon tan de lta bu dag gis kyang yang dag par brgyan par 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-3: de dag ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-8: gnyi ga'i don yang dag par mthong ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos skyes bu dam pa dag la bsten par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-10: de dag la'ang gang 'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-12: nges par 'byung ba yongs su dri bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-13: der de dag chos thos nas gang gi phyir myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-14: skyes bu dam pa rnams zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-17: rkyen gyi rgyal ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-19: de ltar 'jig rten du ston pa byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-20: zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-21: zhes bya ba'i bar yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-23: sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-24: sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu thar par bzhed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:237b-25: 'dod pa'i skyon thams cad rab tu ston par bzhed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238a-1: snyed lhags pa thams cad nga gzhan ma yin par gsung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238a-2: mi mnyam pa med par gsung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238a-5: sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa las 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238a-6: mnyan nas kyang tshul bzhin du yid la byos shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238a-7: phyis ngan song gsum po thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238a-8: yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238a-9: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs gang bdag cag gis sems rtse gcig pas thos par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238a-10: thos nas kyang stobs ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238a-12: rkyen bzhis sems can dag gi 'dod pa rnams 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238a-17: rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'i rtse ba'i 'dod chags kyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-0: de la gzugs kyi @238b 'dod chags gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-1: gzugs kyi 'dod chags zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-2: mkhas pa dus su 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag la mkhas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-5: sems can med pa'i tshul gyis so sor rtogs par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-6: 'on kyang byis pa phyin ci log la yang dag par rten pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-7: rnam par brtag pa dag ya 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-19: zhes nye bar rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-20: de la 'dod pa'i skyes bu smyon pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-21: bud med kyi gzugs dag mthong nas de la mtshan mar 'dzin pa dag yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-22: mngon rtogs su 'dzin pa dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-23: de la de dag 'dod pa'i gzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-25: 'dod pa la lhag par chags pa ma byung ba skyed par byed pas da dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro; ;mkhas pa thams cad kyis rnam par spong bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-28: yid ma bsrungs pas nyes par spyod pa thams cad dang phrad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-29: de dag 'dod pa rnams las nges par 'byung bar mi lta zhing ngan song gsum dang yang dag par ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:238b-30: 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba rnams sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239a-1: yi dvags rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239a-4: 'dod pa'i gzhis dus yun ring por sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rtsub pa tsha ba mi zad pa myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239a-6: bud med dang skyes par shes nas mi sdug pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239a-13: mi'i thod pa dkar po yid la byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239a-14: kun tu sten par byed cing de sgom par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239a-16: bud med kyi gzugs la ji lta bar skyes pa'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239a-17: mdun du ji lta bar thag ring du'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239a-18: thag ring du ji lta bar mdun du'ang de bzhin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239b-7: ji ltar sems shin tu sbyangs pa yin zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239b-10: de cung zad yang dag par shes pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239b-11: de cung zad dmigs par byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239b-13: zhi gnas dang rjes su mthun pa nyon mongs pa'i klong rnam par gcod pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:239b-16: de bzhin du sgom pa'i dbugs rdub pa dang dbugs phyung ba rnam par zhi bar byed cing 'jug par yang mi byed /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:240a-2: der bu ga'i bar du mthong bar byed cing sgom par byed /
