K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:275b-21: nam mkha' de'ang gzung ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-2: ji ltar nam mkha' bdag med pa de bzhin du rlung de dag kyang bdag med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-3: gang dag mig gi dbang po la 'jug cing bskor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-6: 'byung bar byed pa de dag kyang gzung ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-9: dmigs pa dang bral ba dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-10: de bzhin du gang mig gi dbang po la sa'i khams sra ba nyid shing n+ya gro dha'i sa bon tsam yod pa'ang mig thams cad la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa skye bas so sor brtags nas de dag tu mi dmigs so; ;de la bdag nyid kyis nem nur med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-11: de la sa'i khams la bdag med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-12: khams de'ang gzung ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-14: de bzhin du de la chu'i khams la so sor rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-15: zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du me'i khams kyi bar la so sor rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-16: de ltar mig gi bar la so sor brtags pas mig gi 'byung ba chen po rnams la bdag med par bdag nyid kho nas nem nur med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-18: mig dang gzugs la brten nas reg pa'i bdag tu gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas de rlung de'ang nam mkha'i ngo bor yang tshul bzhin du so sor brtags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276a-19: de thams cad du gang du'ang bdag mi dmigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-0: brten nas rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'ang @276b rkyen rnams med na mi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-1: mig dang gzugs la brten cing mig gi rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig 'byung zhing gzugs rnams kyi rkyen gyis 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-2: grogs rnam par shes pas ming dang gzugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-3: de las byung ba'i skye mched drug las reg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-5: sred pa lhag par chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-10: de chos 'di dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-11: mig gi rnam par shes pa la yang dag par brten pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-12: mig gi rnam par shes pa de'ang shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-13: lho phyogs nas ma yin; nub phyogs nas ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-17: skad cig ma gang la mig gi rnam par shes pa byung ba'i skad cig de'ang 'gags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-18: skad cig ma gnyis la nye bar mi gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-19: 'gag pas gang du'ang 'gro ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-25: gang rkyen la rag las pa de bdag med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-26: rkyen de dag kyang byed pa po med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-29: kun nas slong ba po med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-30: de bdag med pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-31: gang bdag med pa de bdag dang bdag gis stong pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:276b-33: mig gi rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-2: 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir de la bdag gam bdag gi med do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-3: 'di la ji ltar chos thams cad len pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-5: nyan thos rnams kyis byas pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-6: rang rgyal ba rnams kyis ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mdzad pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-8: ngo bo nyid thams cad kyi mig gi bdag med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-9: gang bdag med pa de stong pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-10: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-11: de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i bar du bsgoms pas chags pa'i gzhi spong bar 'gyur zhing de'i rgyu las byung ba nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-13: bden pa dang po mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-15: bden pa bzhi pa'i bar mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-16: rna ba zhes bya ba nas sna dang lce'i bar la'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-17: yang de lus thams cad la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pas so sor rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-19: dang por spu gcig la lnga bcur rnam par bcad de bcur bshig pa la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-20: gang dag rten pa'i spu thams cad la'ang de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-21: de la bdag nyid kyis nem nur med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277a-22: spu gang la'ang bdag mi dmigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-9: dro ba nyid la'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-10: rlung gye na du rgyu ba dag dang thur du rgyu bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-12: dor ba med pa'i rlung rnams la'ang de bzhin du ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin du dmigs pa yid la byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-13: lus 'di la de ltar so sor rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-14: sems kyi bar la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pas de ltar so sor rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-16: yid la rten la chos rnams la'ang rten cing yid 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-17: grogs rnam par shes pas ming dang gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-21: sred pa lhag par chags pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-27: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yang dag par brten nas 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-28: yid kyi rnam par shes pa de'ang shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-29: zhes bya ba nas 'og nas 'ongs pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-30: zhes bya ba'i bar yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-31: skad cig ma gang kho na la rkyen gyi 'du 'phrod kyi rgyus yid kyi rnam par shes pa byung ba'i skad cig de'ang 'gags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-32: skad cig ma gnyis pa la nye bar mi gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:277b-33: 'gags pa gang du'ang 'gro ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-1: cad ni; rkyen las yang dag par byung bar skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-3: thams cad rkyen la rag las pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-4: de dag bdag med do; ;rkyen de'ang byed pa yo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-7: kun nas slong ba po mi dmigs pa nyid pas des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-8: de dag bdag med pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-9: gang bdag med ba de bdag dang bdag gis stong pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-11: yid kyi rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-12: ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-13: 'jig pa med pa'i phyir de la bdag gam bdag gi med do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-14: chos thams cad skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-17: de nyan thos rnams kyis byas pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-18: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mdzad pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-20: rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid kyis yid bdag med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-21: gang bdag med pa de stong pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-22: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad bdag med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-23: gang bdag med pa de stong pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278a-24: de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i bar du bsgoms pas chags pa'i gzhi rnams spod bar 'gyur zhing de'i rgyus las byung ba nyon mongs pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-0: de'i che kha cig @278b ni; bden pa dang po mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-2: bden pa bzhi pa'i bar mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-3: mkhas pas 'dir de ltar bdag yongs su btsal nas mi dmigs pa'i phyir ji ltar bdag med pa bzhin rang gi mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-5: mkhas pa stong pa nyid kyis gnas pas gnas shing smon pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-6: mtshan ma med pa'i gnas pas gnas nas dbang po brgya byin thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-7: mchod pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-8: mngon par srung ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-9: rjes su dran par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-10: dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-11: dbang po tshang ba zhes bya ba nas lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i par dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-13: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-14: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-15: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-17: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-18: mchod pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-19: mngon par srung ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-20: rjes su dran par bya ba'i su gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-21: mi'i dbang po thams cad kyis kyang dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa'i bar du yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:278b-23: rig pa yod pa'i spubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying @279a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-1: pos nga la gang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i lag nas bskur zhing 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po ngas bshad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-2: rig pa yod pa'i spubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-5: sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-6: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-7: nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-10: skye mched thams cad yongs su shes par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-11: chos thams cad rnam par 'byed par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-12: thabs thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-13: byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su 'byed par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-14: sems can thams cad dad par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-15: chos thams cad kyi bde ba la 'jug par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-16: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas nges par thul bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-17: bdud kyi yul thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-18: bdud rnams tshar gcod par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-19: phas kyi rgol ba rnams pham par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-20: lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-21: gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-22: lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279a-23: nam mkha' lding rnams mgu bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-0: mi @279b 'am ci rnams dad par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-1: lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-2: rgyal rigs rnams mngon par dga' bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-3: bram ze rnams 'jug par byed pa'o rje'u rigs rnams rab tu sim par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-4: dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-5: bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-6: bud med sbrum ma bde legs su yongs su thar par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-7: mang du thos pa rnams dran par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-8: rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-9: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-15: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-16: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-25: reg par dka' ba'i dngos po thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-26: chos kyi tshul 'bar bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-27: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ston par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-28: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-29: 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-30: zad pa shes pa skyed par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-31: mi skye ba shes pa rang gi mngon sum du byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:279b-32: ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po rnams par 'dul bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-1: bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-2: zhi pa rig pa yod pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-3: sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-4: bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-5: sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-6: chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi pha rol tu 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-8: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-9: chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-10: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-11: bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das par byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-13: rig pa yod pa'i spugs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na gang du sems can de lta bu rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa sngon 'phangs shing yongs su ma zad pa'i lha dang mi grangs med pa dpag tu med pa dang ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-15: der chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-16: sems can dkrigs phrag 'bum gyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-17: len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280a-18: de'i tshe khri phrag bdun cu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-0: zhi ba rig pa yod pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags 'di thob par gyur cing theg @280b pa gsum las phyir mi ldog par yung gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-1: de'i tshe lha dang mi grangs med dang tu med pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldag par yang gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-3: de'i tshe brgyad khri bzhi stong ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-4: mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi gzungs sngags bzhi po dben pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-6: stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-7: smon pa med pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-8: zhi ba rig pa yod pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags de dag gi don bstan pa thos nas de'i tshe sems can grangs med pa dpag tu med pa dag gi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-9: gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-13: gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad yongs su zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-14: 'dod chags pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs kyang rang gi mngon sum du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-16: mi sdug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:280b-20: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-3: dbugs rdub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dran pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-6: kha cig gis ni; lhag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-10: bsam gtan khyad par can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-12: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-14: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-16: bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-22: nyan thos dang thun mong pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-24: rnag sangs rgyas dang thun mong pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-26: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang thun mong pa'i ting ge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-28: gzungs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-29: de'i tshe bud med gang dag sems rtse gcig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-30: bud med kyi dngos po skyon du bgrang ba'i sems kyis tshul bstan pa 'di thos pa de las mi'i bud med dkrigs phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi mo mtshan nub par gyur cing pho mtshan yang byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281a-31: lha'i bu mo byed ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-0: klu'i @281b bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-1: gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgyad khri drug stong snyed de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-2: lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyad cu rtsa bzhi snyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-3: nam mkha' lding gi bu mo bdun khri snyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-4: mi 'am ci'i bu mo dkrigs phrag bcu gnyis snyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-5: lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo stong snyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-6: yi dvags mo drigs phrag dgu bcu snyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-7: sha za mo dkrigs phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi bu mo mo mtshan nub par gyur cing pho mtshan byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-8: gang bud med bsrum pa de'ang ngas lus dang sems kyi bde ba mchog la yang dag par gtad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-9: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'ang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-10: mtho 'tsham pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-11: 'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang ldan par khye'u'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-13: btsas nas kyang dbang po tshang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-14: gzugs mchog dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-15: dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-19: shes rab dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-20: gang sbrum pa bts'a bar mi byed pa de'i nad thams cad ngas rab tu zhi bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-21: mngal na yod pa de'ang tshal de lta bu'i bde ba dang yang dag par ldan par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:281b-22: lus dang sems kyi bde ba dang yang dag par ldan par byas nas kyang de phyis bde ba mchog gis khye'u dang bu mo btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-0: @282a *// gzugs mchog dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-1: dran pa mchog dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-5: shes rab dang ldan pa'i bar du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-18: mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba gsol te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-21: de bzhin gshegs pas da ltar sngon ma thos pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-22: sems kyi yongs su rtog pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang dag par 'byang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-24: srid par 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'byang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-25: bdud rtsi'i byang grol gyis yang dag par tshim par mdzad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-26: mchog tu ngo mtshar lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-27: sems can yongs su smin pa thams cad kun tu srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-28: rnyog pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su 'byang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282a-29: shes rab mchog gi mig thob par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-0: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung ba rgyun mig cad pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas da ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad snang bar @282b mdzad pa'i chos kyi char rab tu phab lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag cag gis rngo ci thogs par mchod pa bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-2: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la brtson pa rnams ma gtogs par lha thams cad ces bya ba nas lus sprul po'i par gyis kyang lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-3: pheg rdob pa'i sgra 'byung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-4: lha rdzas kyi gser gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu pha bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-5: zhes bya ba nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-11: lha rdzas kyi me tog phreng gi bar gyi char mngon par rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-13: ji ltar nyi ma shar ba la'ang mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir rin po che'i me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-18: 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-19: las 'byang ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-20: de nas de snyed kyi lha'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-21: klu'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-22: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:282b-23: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-0: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po @283a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-3: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-4: yi dvags kyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-5: sha za'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-6: lus srul po'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-8: gang dang gang du dge slong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-12: dad pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-13: rigs kyi bu mo mi sdug pa sngon du gtong ba tshul de lta bus shes bgyi ba nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis gnas par bgyid la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-14: ji skad sngar bshad pa'i dge ba'i phyogs yid la bgyid pas gnas par bgyid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-15: dad pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu mo'i bar 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la'ang rang gi ris kyi ston pa'i 'du shes gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-18: yid kyis sems can thams cad la rim gro'i spyod pa bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283a-23: yo byad rnams kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-0: kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco @283b lnga las yongs su thar par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-2: lus kyi kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su thar par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-10: dad pa ma mchis pa rnams las yongs su thar par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-11: khams kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa las bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-12: ji ltar mthun pa'i bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-15: yo byad kyi gzhi las rim gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-18: sbyin bdag yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can rnams nad dang dgra'i kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-20: dgra thams cad kyi kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa las bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-21: dug gi kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-22: rgyal po'i kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-24: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-25: mu ge'i kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bsrung bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-26: kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco lnga po de dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:283b-27: gang dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa la gnas pa'i bar gyi dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-1: dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-2: rigs kyi bu mo de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-3: gang dag mi sdug pa sngon du gtong ba'i tshul de lta bus zhes bgyi ba nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis gnas par bgyid la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-4: ji skad sngar bshad pa bzhin nam gyi cha stod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-5: nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par gnas par bgyid pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-6: gang du gnas pa'i yul 'khor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-10: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-11: dgon pa'i gnas de dag rang gi ris gyi khyim khol gyi khyim gyi bar bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o; ;kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco lnga po de dag las yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-13: gang du de lta bu'i dge ba la brtson pa tha na gang zag gcig cig gnas par bgyid kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-14: der tha na nyin zhag gcig cig gnas par bgyid kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-15: yul 'khor de dag rang gi ris mi khyim khol gyi khyim gyi bar bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284a-16: kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco lnga las yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284b-7: bu mo de dag kyang rang gi ris lags par gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284b-8: kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco lnga po de dag las rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284b-10: gang dag de lta bu'i dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa'i gang zag rnams la gnas khang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284b-18: yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284b-20: rim gro bgyid pa dag kyang kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa de lta bu de dag las bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284b-22: gang yang bud med sbrum pa gang zag de lta bu dag la bkur sti bgyid pa de la dus rtag tu rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i chos can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284b-24: mchog tu dga' ba mang bar bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:284b-26: yang gang dang gang du de lta bur tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa la brtson pa'i gang zag la snying brtse bar gsol ba 'debs par bgyid pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-0: de'i ming brjod par bgyid pa @285a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-3: kun tu srung bar bgyid pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-4: mi dge ba las slar bzlog pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-5: dge ba la sbyor du stsal pa'am rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-6: sems can de dag kyang kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco lnga po de dag las bdag cag gis rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-7: yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o; ;mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-8: mi ma lags pa'i sems can gang dag de lta bu'i dge ba'i phyogs la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par brtson pa'i gang zag rnams kyi tshig mi nyan zhing mi bgyi bar sems pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-9: gang dag de dag la gshe bar bgyi ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-10: phan pa ma lags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-13: gnod sems su bgyi ba'i slad du rtul bar bgyid pa'i sems can de dag gi thad du bdag cag gis mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-14: mi ma yin pa dag gtang bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-15: de la bzod par mi bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-16: gang dag de lta bu'i dge ba'i phyogs la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par brtson pa'i gang zag rnams kyi tshig mi mnyan zhing mi bgyi bar sems pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-17: gang dag de dag la gshe bar bgyid pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285a-19: phan pa ma lags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-0: rab tu nyams par @285b bgyi ba'i slad du rtul bar bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-1: gnod pa bco lnga po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-3: myur du nad kyi sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-4: longs spyod kyi sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-5: nye bar spyod pa las yongs su nyams pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-6: yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-7: 'khor sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-8: dbang phyug las rgud pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-10: dgras rdzi ba'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-11: rtag tu sems kun tu 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-13: rgyal rigs kyi kun tu 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-14: chom rkun gyi kun tu 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-15: bud med kyi kun tu 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-16: myur du tshe zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-19: gnod pa de dag dang myur du ldan par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-20: sems can gang dag de lta bu'i tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa la brtson pa rnams kyi tshig mi nyan zhing mi bgyid par sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-21: de dag la'ang gshe bar bgyid pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:285b-23: phan pa ma lags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286a-0: rab tu nyams par bgyi pa'i slad @286a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286a-1: du rtul bar bgyid pa'i sems can de dag skra gnas bdag cag la skyabs su mchis kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286a-2: gsang sngags sna tshogs sgrub pa'i yo byad kyis rim gro bgyi bar brtson par bgyis su lags kyang de dag gi don du bdag cag rim gro'i bsnyen bkur blang bar mi bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286a-3: de dag gi skyabs mi bgyi'o; ;de dag gi bgyi ba mi sgrub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286a-4: don sgrub par mi bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286a-6: klu nas lus srul po'i bar sdang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286a-7: snying brtse ba ma mchis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286a-9: 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de lta bu'i dge ba'i phyogs la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par brtson pa dgon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286a-18: 'chag sa'i gnas na gnas pa'i gang zag rnams kyi tha dad du sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286a-19: rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang nye bar mchi bar bgyid cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286a-20: de lta bu'i gang zag rnams kyi lus kun tu 'khrug pa'am sems kun tu 'khrug par bgyid la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-1: tha na de lta bu'i gang zag rnams kyi rim gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-2: sbyin bdag gang dag lags pa de dag la'ang lha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-3: klu nas lus srul po'i bar sdang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-5: 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag gis lus kun tu 'khrug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-6: sems kun tu 'khrug par bgyid cing mdangs 'phrog par bgyid la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-7: sngon gyi las kyi rkyen ma gtogs lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-9: klu nas lus sprul po'i bar de dag bdag cag gis so sor ma zlog gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-10: slar ma zlog gam; nongs pa ci mchis pa'i chad pa la ma bkod par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-11: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag cag gis bslus par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-12: bdag cag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi spyod yul lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-13: rang rgyal ba'i spyod yul lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-16: byang grol gyi bde ba thob par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:286b-19: 'di ltar yang khyed dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul 'bar bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287a-0: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs @287a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287a-1: so; ;khyed kyis de ltar byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287a-2: de ltar byas na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la khyed kyis mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287a-5: gang la la brtson pa dang brtul pa de lta bus legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rjes su srung bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287a-6: de ltar zhugs shing chos kyis gnas pa'i gang zag rnams la rjes su srung bar byed pa'i rigs kyi bu de 'khor bar 'khor ba na dpal dam pa la nye bar spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287a-7: de la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287a-8: de lta bas na sdug bsnga dang mi mthun pa bde ba 'dod pa khyed kyis de ltar byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287a-9: 'di ltar khyed legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' la zhugs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287a-10: khyed yang legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287a-11: yang de'i tshe mi ma yin pa'i 'byung po mdangs dang khrag za ba gang dag yin pa grangs med pa dpag tu med pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287b-0: sha khrag @287b 'tshal ba dag lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287b-1: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams la rnam par mtho ba tsam par mi bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287b-3: da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin nyan thos gang dag de lta bu'i mi sdug pa'i sbyor ba rnal 'byor yid la bgyid pas gnas pa'i gang zag de lta bu dag gal te bdag cag gis rnam par mtho btsams par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287b-4: bdag cag dad pa can ma lags par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287b-5: dbang po thams cad kyi spyod yul rnams su mchi bar mi nus par gyur ! cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287b-6: gang zag de lta bu dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287b-7: bdag cag gis kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287b-8: de dag gi rim gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287b-9: sbyin bdag gang dag lags pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos chos kyis gnas pa mi sdug pa'i sbyor ba yid la bgyid pas gnas pa dag yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid pa gtsug lag khang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:287b-17: bro 'tshal ba'i gsos sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid pa gang dag lags pa de dag bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288a-1: bgyi'o; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288a-4: khyed kyis de ltar byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288a-5: yang de'i tshe sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chos kyis gnas pa de lta bu'i mi sdug pa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor la brtson par gnas par bgyid pa gang dag lags pa de dag gi lus la bdag gis rgya chen po'i sa'i bcud kyi mdangs gtang bar bgyi ste; de'i chos kyis gnas pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par brtson pa de dag shin tu gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288a-8: kha dog dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288a-9: dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288a-11: shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288a-13: sbyin pa chen po dang ldan pa gang khyod nga'i sras /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288a-17: chos kyi sprul pa dag de lta bu'i bsod snyoms kyis yang dag par tshim par byed ba legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288a-18: sbyin pa chen po dang yang dag par ldan pa des khyod theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-0: yang de'i tshe dpal @288b lha mo chen mos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-2: bdag gis kyang de lta bu'i chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyis sbyin pa po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-3: sbyin bdag gang dag lags pa'i sbyin pa po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-4: sbyin bdag de dag gi dga' ston dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-9: longs spyod rnams ma tshang ba ma mchis par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-10: mi sdug pa'i sbyor bas zhes bgyi ba nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yid la bgyid pa'i bar gyis nyin mtshan 'da' bar bgyid pa gang dag lags pa de dag gtsug lag khang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-16: bro 'tshal ba'i gsos sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-17: yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-18: yongs su skyong bar bgyid pa de dag gi yo byed thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-21: lus dang sems kyi bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-23: mchog tu dga' ba mang bar bdag gis yang dag par gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:288b-24: snod du gyur pa'i spyin gnas rnams dang ma bral zhing lhan cig 'grogs su stsal bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-0: chos la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang @289a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-2: snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-3: log par mi ltung ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-4: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-5: snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-6: mi nyams pa'i chos can du yang dag par bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-8: sbyin pa chen po la yang dag par brten pa legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-9: khyod brtson pa'i brtul ba des theg pa chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-10: yang de'i tshe gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-12: 'dus pa chen po'i le'u 'di bshad pa na bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa yongs su skyong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-13: yo byad dang yang dag par ldan pa'i sbyin pa po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-14: sbyin bdag mang po gang dag mchis pa'i rkyen des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir chos kyi tshul yun ring du 'bar zhing mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas smras pa; kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-16: ci nam mkha' yongs su nyams pa mngon nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289a-18: gnas la sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-0: ci @289b chos rnams kyi yang dag par 'du ba mngon nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-2: ci yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir mi mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-4: ci yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-5: nam mkha' mi 'dra bar mngon nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-8: tha mi dad pa nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-9: tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir mi 'dra ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-15: mi skye ba'i chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pas mi 'dra ba med pa nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-19: 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi tha dad pa nyid mi mngon nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-21: ji ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-22: de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du 'dus byas kyi chos rnams nam mkhar sgro btags pa nyid kyi phyir tha mi dad pa nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-24: ci yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin du 'dus byas kyi chos rnams yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-25: 'on te 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yin; smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-26: stong pa nyid sgro btags pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-27: de bzhin nyid du 'dus byas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-28: 'dus ma byas dang yang dag par ldan pa ma yin no; ;yang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-29: ci stong pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-31: ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:289b-32: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-1: med pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba stong pa nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-2: 'di la gang stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i dngos po'ang mi dmigs so; ;rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-3: ji ltar ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa dang mtshan gyi gzhi mtshan gyi gzhis stong pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-4: mtshan gyi gzhi med pa mtshan gyi gzhis stong pa yin pa de bzhin du tshul des chos thams cad shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-6: de ltar brjod du med pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-7: 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi da'i ngo bo nyid nyan thos rnams kyis byas pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-8: rang rgyal ba rnams kyis ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mdzad pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-10: de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-13: 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid thams cad nam mkha' dang yang dag par ldan pa nyid kyi phyir mi 'dra ba med pa nyid ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-14: tha mi dad pa yin par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290a-15: bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sngon stong pa nyid kyi tshul la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sems can dpag tu med pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-0: sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa zad cing chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba @290b thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-1: sems can khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos rnams la gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-3: 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-4: kun tu srung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-5: yang de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-6: mchog tu dga' ba dam pa skyes te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-8: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed gtams zhing sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i snang ba chen pos khyab pa de lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-10: btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-11: mchog tu ngo mtshar lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dang mtshams gzhan gyi khor yug chen po'i rim gtogs par g-yar sngar gzhan ci yang gda' bar mi 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:290b-13: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das; gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad mthong lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-1: snyoms par zhugs pa'i snang ba ji lta bur 'gyur ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-2: ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bas bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi yon tan bkod pa mthong lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rang gi spyod yul na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyis mngon par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-8: sngon gyi tshogs bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rang gi gnas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa mtha' yas par bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ma chags pa'i spyod yul gyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-10: ye shes gsal ba bskyed par 'jug pa'i blo gros dang yang dag par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-11: ye shes kyi pha rol tu gshegs pa las rab tu skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-12: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par yang dag par bsgrubs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-13: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul tshad med pa la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291a-14: chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-0: chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba brnyes pa'i rgyu @291b mthun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-1: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-2: yongs su smin par mdzad pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-3: bag chags yang dag par bcom pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa yang dag par bstan pa na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-5: des na phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dpag tu med pa khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-6: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa dpag tu med pa bzhugs shing gzhes pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-7: nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-8: de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-9: srog chags bye ba mang po gzhan dag gis kyang tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la sangs rgyas kyi yul nyid kyi spyod yul bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi rgyu mthun pa bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-11: bdag cag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa'i bar yang dag par bstan du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:291b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yang dag par bstan pa gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koo di n+ya la @292a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-3: nyan thos chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-5: rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa thams cad rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas par byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-6: nga'ang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-10: mi ma yin pa'i bar gang dag yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-11: bden pa mthong ba gang dag yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-12: rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa gang dag yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-13: theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa gang dag yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-14: dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad skyil mo krung du 'khod nas snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyi spyod yul la shes rab kyis nam mkha' khyab par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-16: mkhas pa mang po thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa nyi ma dang zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-17: de ni; nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292b-0: @292b sems can thams cad kyis shes pa'i spyod yul ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292b-1: de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi yul mkhyen pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292b-3: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292b-4: gling bzhi ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292b-5: ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292b-6: nyi ma dang zla ba bye ba phrag brgya snyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292b-7: srid pa'i rtse mo lha'i gnas bye ba phrag brgya snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la chud par yang dag par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292b-8: thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gnas par yang dag par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can sems can dmyal ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292b-13: mi gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi nyon mongs pa'ang thams cad kyi thams cad du rgyun chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:292b-14: de dag thams cad kyis lus dang sems kyi bde ba 'di lta bu thob par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-0: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i zhi gnas thob pa'i dge slong snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin @293a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-2: langs pa de dag thams cad kyi rang gi lus la snang ba nub bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-4: sems can gang su dag snyoms par zhugs pa de dag thams cad ting nge 'dzin las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-5: de dag thams cad lus dang sems kyi bde ba de lta bu dang yang dag par ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-6: de dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob cing rmad du byung ba thob pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-7: dbang po tshim nas de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du gnas shing 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i ba spu'i khung bu la bltas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-8: de dag thams cad kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas 'od zer 'di lta bu byung ba de lta bu mthong bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-10: nyi ma dang zla ba gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-11: nor bu rin po che chan po gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi snang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'od zer gyi snang ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od de lta bu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rab tu byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing @293b thams cad snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa ma yin pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dang de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad 'di lta bu'i dbyangs brjod pas kun tu gang bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-3: byams dang thugs rje'i rgyu mthun pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-4: sems can kun la phan mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-5: bsod nams las grub pa la ltos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-6: sems can kun la thugs brtse'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-7: sangs rgyas spyod yul ston par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-8: thugs rjes 'od zer bkye bas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-9: zhing rnams thams cad gsal bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-10: re res zhing ni rgyas gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-11: gnas kun gsal ba mthong nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-12: byang chub mchog ni yongs tshol zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-13: sems kyi mchog kyang skyed par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-15: de dag thams cad myur du lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-17: khyed kyis bskor ba byas nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-18: gang dag rdzu 'phrul ma thob kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-19: rgyang ma nas ni phyag 'tshal la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-20: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:293b-21: mi yi skyes mchog rnams su 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rang rang gi sangs @294a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294a-1: rgyas kyi zhing nas dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad nas thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i dgongs pa dang smon lam yongs su bskang ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294a-2: de'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294a-3: de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294a-11: lto 'phye chen po gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag du mas mdun du bdar cing yongs su bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294a-12: de dag rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams nas rdzu 'phrul gyis yang dag par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir gshegs te bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la lan gsum bskor ba mdzad nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor gyi sems can gang dag yin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la bskor ba byed cing de lta bu'i mchod pa byed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294a-13: yang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu'ang dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294b-0: de'i dus na sems can gang dag sangs @294b rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la chung pa de dag thams cad kyis phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294b-1: de dag thams cad kyis de nas yang dag par zhugs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294b-2: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la bskor ba mdzad cing gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294b-3: rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug cing rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs te chos ston pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294b-4: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs nas rang rang gi 'khor las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i bsngags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294b-11: sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa bstan pa bzhin der sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294b-12: rang rang gi lung bstan pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:294b-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295a-1: thos kyi theg pa la'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295a-2: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la chud pa gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295a-3: lung bstan pa'ang thams cad kyis thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295a-4: snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag na sems can gang dag yod pa'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba ci 'dra ba myong ba dag kyang 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la chud cing 'khod pa rnams kyis mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295a-5: de'i tshe snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dag na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang snang ba de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'ang mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang thabs cig tu 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la bskor ba mdzad pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-0: de'i tshe sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu dga' ba'i dam pa skyes te thams cad sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyun chad do; ;snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa gang dag sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i @295b phyir zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can dag yod pa der sangs rgyas kyi sku byad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-2: sgra brjod pa gcig gis go bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-3: dge ba'i don du zhing gcig tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-4: nged cag thams cad gshegs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-5: sangs rgyas rnams ni mi bzhugs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-6: sus kyang dpal chen mi thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-7: khyed cag gis ni byang chub tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-8: gcig tu sems ni gzhol byas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-9: khyed cag phyin chad 'khor bar ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-10: sdug bsngal skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-11: sh'akya khyu mchog mchod pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-12: de la bskor ba bya ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-13: 'di ltar khyed cag thams cad ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-14: nga dang thabs cig myur du 'deng //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-15: 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:295b-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku byad kyis re re zhing sems can rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu de nas chas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la sems can de dag gis rin po che @296a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-1: sna tshogs nas rol mo'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-3: glu sna tshogs ba'i bar gyis mchod ba byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-4: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg par smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-5: thams cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-6: de'i tshe de dag cho ga bzhin du ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrubs nas rang rang gi zhing du dong ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig ni rang rgyal ba'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba nas kha cig ni nyan thos kyi lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-10: kha cig ni tshangs pa'i lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-11: kha cig ni brgya byin gyi lus byad kyis zhes bya ba nas kha cig ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-12: kha cig ni sred med kyi bu'i lus byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-13: kha cig ni dbang phyug chen po'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-14: kha cig ni klu'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-15: kha cig ni gnod sbyin gyi lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296a-16: kha cig ni lha ma yin gyi lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296b-0: kha cig ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na @296b sems can nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i bar du yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcu ba rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296b-1: der nyan thos kyi lus byad kyi bar gyis sems can rnams la chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang sems can thams cad kyis snang ba de mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'ang mthong nas sems can de dag shin tu dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes shing dbang po rnams tshim ste thams cad sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyun chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296b-4: de dag la bde ba'i tshor ba'ang byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gang nyan thos kyi lus byad kyis chos ston pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296b-6: des bsod nams chen po bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas 'di lta bu'i dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296b-7: sgra brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad go bar byed pa 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296b-8: sdug pa'i sems ni gzhom par byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296b-9: sdig pa'i lta ba spong bar byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:296b-12: khyed cag sdig pa'i sems kyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-2: rga ba dang ni 'chi ba'i lus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-3: 'khor bar ring por zhugs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-4: ston pa mthong ba rnyed par dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-6: chos thos pa yang rnyed par dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-7: dge byed rab tu rnyed par dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-8: de ltar khyed kyis gus byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-9: byang chub tu ni 'dun pa skyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-10: sdug bsngal kun las thar gyis la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-12: rtag pa dang ni chad pa'i blos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-13: chos gnyis myur du spangs nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-14: 'du byed thams cad bdag med la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-15: tshul bzhin du ni brtag par byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-16: kun 'byung sred dang sdug bsngal yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-17: ye shes chu yis bkru bar byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-19: thams cad lhan cig myur du 'deng //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag nyan thos kyi lus byad kyi bar gyis byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297a-21: sems can rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed tshad med pa dang lhan cig tu rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas chas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-0: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom @297b ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la de dag gis rin po che sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-1: ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-4: rgyan gyi lhab lhub sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-10: rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-13: gar sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du phyin nas rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-15: de bzhin du rang rang gi 'khor rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i bsngags ba dang grags pa nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi bar brjod par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-16: de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'khor de'i sems can grangs med pa dpag tu med pa yod pa de dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-17: de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-18: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par yang sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-19: thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:297b-20: de'i tshe de dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298a-1: thob nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298a-2: sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir gang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la chud par gyur pa'i bkod pa de lta bu'ang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298a-3: de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams la ngo mtshar thob cing rmad du byung ba thob bo; ;de'i tshe gang dag sngon chad sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med pa dpag tu med pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298a-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298a-5: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298a-6: de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg par yang sems dag bskyed de; de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298a-7: de bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298a-8: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298a-9: zhes bya ba'i bar du yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298a-10: sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phyir ji ltar bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul chen po sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyu mthun par ting nge 'dzin de lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298a-11: 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-1: de nas bdud sdig can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa nyid kyi pho brang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings na bzhugs pa mthong nas mchog tu yid mi bde ste lus thams cad rdul thon zhing mchi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-2: byung nas mi dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-3: de bdud sdig can gyis gnas thams cad du rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-13: kha la lces ldag par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-15: lag pa gnyis brkyang zhing bskum par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-16: mgo la lag pa gnyis kyis rdob par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-18: nu ma la mnyed par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-19: de mthong bas bdud kyis gnas na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-20: mngon par mi dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-21: yid mi bde bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-22: de nas bdud shor ba nam mkha'i shing zhes bya ba des bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad pas dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-23: 'khrug sems yid rab mi bde bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-24: ci slad de ltar khyod rgyug cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-25: kun la dga' bar mi dgongs pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:298b-26: gang du yang ni dgyes mi mnga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-1: sdig can gdong mchi ma dang bcas pas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-2: goo ta ma stobs can mthong nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-3: nga yi snying ni rnam gas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-4: lus kun nas ni rdul thon cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-5: gdong yang mchi mas gang ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-6: sems can thams cad mthun pa ru //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-7: ji ltar thos pa bzhin du der //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-8: tshogs chen rol gyis dong bas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-9: nga yi yul ni stongs par byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-10: nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i yul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-11: phyogs bcu las ni lhags pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-12: de la bskor bar byas nas su; ;bye ba mang pos yongs su bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-13: bdud rnams thams cad 'khor bcas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-14: de la yang ni skyabs song bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-15: nga yi dpung ni ma mthong ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-16: gang na'ang nga yi phyogs med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-17: de nas bdud sdig can la bdud shor ba nam mkha'i shing des 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-18: bdag cag thams cad 'khor bcas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-19: go cha sra ba dag bgos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-20: ral gri 'khor lo mda' po ches //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-21: de yi lus ni phye mar rlag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-23: de la yang ni skyabs song zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-24: der yang rang nyid song bas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-25: de la dmag ni yang dag phul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-26: nga ni bcing pa dam pos bcings //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299a-27: de nas bdud shor ba nam mkha'i shing des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-0: thabs @299b rnams kun gyis ci bgyid kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-1: dgra ni dbang du mi 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-2: mdza' bo'i gzugs kyis bslus bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-3: de lta na ni gsad par nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-5: mdza' bo'i gzugs kyis der 'gro bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-6: 'di ltar bdag gis der bsam na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-7: rang gi mgul na dri nga ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-8: ro myags 'jigs su rung ba mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-9: nam mkha'i shing gis slar smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-10: bdud dang klu dang bsam gtan pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-11: lus gsum dag tu bshad pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-12: bdag cag gi ni yul bcom yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-13: klu rnams kyi ni yul brtan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-14: klu de dag kyang gzi brjid che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-15: dmag rnams mang zhing stobs kyang tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-16: de dag gi ni yul mchis pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-17: kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-18: 'dod pa'i khams na gang su dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-19: klu yi bdag po gnas gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-20: de dag rnams la goo ta ma //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-21: thal bar rlag par myur du bsgo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-23: kye; bsod nams shes rab chen po can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-24: klu yi gnas su nyid song la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-25: goo ta ma dang dmag 'gyed par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-26: thams cad la ni khyod kyis bsgo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-29: zhes nas dmag brgya stong go bgos pa de dag la lag pa bsgrang ste bsgrags pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-30: klu yi rten du bdag cag 'deng /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:299b-31: goo ta ma dang dmag 'gyed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-2: deng ni bdag cag grogs bya bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-3: thams cad la ni bsgo bar bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-4: de na 'khod pa de dag kyang gang du yongs su'ang 'gro bar ma nus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-5: shor ba nam mkha'i shing de gdong mchi ma dang bcas shing spu zing zhes byed par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-6: thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas sdig can la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-7: bdag cag gis ni gang du yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-8: mchi bar bgyi ba'i rngo ma thogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-9: rdzu 'phrul brtan pa goo ta ma //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-10: drang srong gi ni sgyu lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-11: bdag cag thams cad rkang pa bcings //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-12: lus rnams kun la rdul yang byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-13: gang gis dgra las khyed rgyal bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-14: gzhan zhig kyang ni mdzad par gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-15: bdud sdig can de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas mya ngan du gyur pa de lta bu'i blo skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-16: gang bdag gis klu'i rten thams cad du gnag kun tu smra bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-17: mngon par mi dga' ba skyed par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-18: klu thams cad kun tu gshe bar byed pa'i bdud kyi stobs de lta bu yang dag par rjes su dran par bya gor mchag snyam mo; ;de nas de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyi klu'i rten thams cad du sha sbrang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300a-20: sbrang pu gdug pa rnams sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-1: rdul nga byung ba dang mngon par mi dga' bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-3: klu chen po skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-6: bu mo thams cad mngon par mi dga' nas de dag thams cad kyis rnam par bltas te bdag cag la co 'dri bar byed pa su yin snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-7: de dag gis ma shes shing ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-9: klu chen po skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-12: bu mo gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang khro bas zil gyis non nas de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang gi gnas bor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-13: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas kyang rang gi gnas bor nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'dabs na ri kha la ti ya zhes bya ba yod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-14: ri kha la ti ya de'i rtse mo na drang srong thub pa rnams kyi gnas kyi rten na kun rten ces bya ba rgyar dpag tshad bzhi khri pa lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa bzhi yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-15: drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du rten cing bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-16: der de dag zhugs ma thag tu 'di lta bu'i lus chung dur gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-18: mig sman bsku ba'i thur ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:300b-19: de dag kyang rang khros pa'i mthus re re'ang 'di lta bu'i lus ri rab tsam du yang dag par shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:301a-0: @301a *// de dag gis skad 'byin kyang ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:301a-1: de nas 'gro bar yang ma nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:301a-3: khros bas zil gyis non nas der 'khod do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:301b-12: de bzhin du mig dmar zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
