K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-11: snying rje brtan pos de srid 'khor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-12: rnga bong de ni skyes pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-13: rgyal sras bu ram shing pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-14: rigs su zas gtsang gi ni sras //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-15: des ni btsas ma thag tu khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-17: yid bde rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-18: lha dang klu yi bu rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-19: 'byung po gnod sbyin rgyal pos khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-20: der ni mchod phyir thams cad lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-21: de yis gom pa bdun bor te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-22: ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-24: 'gro ba rga nad sdug bsngal dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-25: 'chi bas gzir las ngas bsgral zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-26: zhi ba bde ba mya ngan med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-27: skam la dgod ces sh'aka sras gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-28: me tog dri dang rin chen dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-29: lha klu rnams kyis gtor gyur cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-30: 'byung po'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-31: sras po la ni bstod gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-32: bskal pa mang po du mar yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-33: sngon chad khyod kyis dul ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:338b-34: sbyin dang bsam gtan dgyes la brten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-3: thams cad kyi ni tha ma lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-4: sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-5: ring po mi thogs khyod 'tshang rgya; ;des kyang dpa' bo brtan par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-6: mtshungs pa med de bud med tshogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-7: drug khri tham pa spangs nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-8: spyod pa rab bstan lo drug spyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-9: g-yo sgyu can ni sder bcas pa'i; ;bdud ni gcig pus bcom nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-10: byang chub zhi mchog gzhal med brnyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-11: mya ngan med lam don dam gzigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-12: byams dang ye shes thugs rje yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-13: sems can kun dang mi mnyam zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-14: 'byung bo dag ni thams cad la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-15: de ni byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-16: sems can gang la'ang mtho mi 'tsham //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-17: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las; ;thar par mdzad cing de yang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-18: rnam bcings brtson ra thar mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-19: ma ga dha na de gnas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-20: 'gro ba'i nang na chos kyang ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-21: de la khyod kyis gsol ba thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-22: byams pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-23: drang srong mchog gi thad du dengs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-24: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-25: khyed cag yongs su thar par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-26: rang nyid kyang ni 'dong bar gyis; ;dga' mchog bde ba 'dod rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-27: phyin chad mkha' lding thams cad las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339a-29: rtag bde sdug bsngal bral dgar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-0: btson @339b ra 'di ni g-yo sgyu can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-1: bdud ni khyod la rnam par 'tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-2: ji ltar nga yis bshad pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-3: thams cad kyang ni gzung bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-4: yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-8: bu mo gang dag thams cad 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-9: 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-10: chos thams cad kyi dbang gis pha rol tu phyin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-11: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-12: bde ba thams cad sbyin par mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-13: dga' ba thams cad skyed par mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-14: shes rab thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-15: rtag tu byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-16: thugs rje thams cad kyis khyab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-17: 'phrin las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-19: yang dag pa'i mig gsung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-21: klu rnams kyis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-22: srid pa gsum gyi dgra bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-23: mchod pa thams cad 'os pa; bdag cag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi btson ra 'dir 'phangs lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-24: 'di nas bdag cag thar par mdzad par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-25: klu de dag dang lhan cig bdag cag gnas par bgyi'o; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad sngon gyi lus kyi gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:339b-26: gnas de nas 'gro bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-0: de dag thams cad kyis drang @340a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-1: srong skar ma la dga' ba la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-4: sems can thams cad la bde bar bzhed pa rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i chos nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-5: de la bdag cag skyabs su nye bar gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-7: bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las bdag cag thar par mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-8: skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rgyu mthun pa thams cad mkhyen pa thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par ldog par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-10: byang chub kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-11: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sems can yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi bar du thob par bya ba'i phyir mang por ma byung ba la dmigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-12: nyan thos dang thun mong ba sems can la dmigs pa'i gnas pa mchog bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-13: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slob dpon la rag las pa rnams las yang dag par byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-14: so sor brtag pa la dmigs pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340a-15: da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med pa dpag tu med pa rdul phra rab kyi @340b rdul snyed na theg pa bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-1: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-2: bdud bzhi gdul ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-3: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi chus khrus mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-4: da ltar shin tu kun tu rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs kyi sems can gyi khams la dmigs pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-5: kun nas ldang ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-11: rnam par gzhag pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-18: tha mi dad pa nyid ces bya ba nas phung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-20: 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-21: mig gi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa zhes bya ba'i bar nas yid kyi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa'i bar la smon pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-22: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-23: 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-26: de bzhin nyid 'dres pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-27: gang 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-28: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis sgrol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:340b-29: phyad pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-1: par dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dag la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa; sems nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-3: ma chags pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-4: lta ba thams cad kyi bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa yang dag par bcom pa rnams la tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-5: kye drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na'ang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-6: klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-7: klu'i rgyal po zla ba la rtsub pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-8: klu'i rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba de dag byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pas de dag snang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-9: rnam par bskyings pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-10: de'i tshe klu gzhan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-11: byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pas byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341a-12: byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dga' ba la de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-0: khyod bzhud la snying rje chen po thob pa gang gis 'dir bdag cag bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las yongs su thar bar bgyid pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje @341b chen po thob pa de la bdag cag gi tshig gis gsol ba thob cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-2: zhes smras nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'khor drang srong stong phrag mang po dang de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-3: 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde theg pa chen po'i mdo las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-4: nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las le'u brgyad pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-5: bcom ldan 'das la klu thams cad skyabs su nye bar gnas pa bdud sdig can gyis thos te shas cher 'khrugs shing skrag la rgya shug gi 'dab ma bzhin du lus rab tu 'dar zhing lus rdul nas lag pa gnyis bsgrengs te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-6: lag 'gro rnams ni skyabs su dong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-7: skye rgu thams cad rmongs gyur cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-8: 'chi med lam la gzhog byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-9: mi zad g-yo sgyu can la ltos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-10: de'i tshe na bdud kyi bu mo mun bral ma zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-11: sems can gang dag thos tsam gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-12: dge sbyong la ni skyabs su mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-13: gang dag de yi tshig thos shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-14: de mthong ba lta smos ci 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-15: brtson 'grus sna tshogs sbyor ba yis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-16: khyod kyis yun ni ring du gzigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-17: bka' mchid sna tshogs lhan cig mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-18: de yi sgyu ni ma bslabs sam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-20: dge sbyong goo tam brtan pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:341b-21: rang bzhin mkhas pa chen po ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-2: rgal nas skye rgu sgrol bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-4: stong pa la ni gang zhugs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-5: bdud rnams bye bas mi bskyod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-6: byang grol bde ba sbyin bgyid pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-7: de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-8: mtshan nyid ma mchis ldan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-9: de bzhin nyid la gang rten cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-10: ye shes kyi ni pha rol phyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-11: de la bdag ni skyabs su mchis; ;sgyu de bdag gis bslab par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-12: sems can thams cad rnam par dgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-13: chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-14: bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-15: bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya snyed bdud kyi gnas der 'khod nas byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-16: bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing dngangs te rmongs nas stobs kyi shugs kyis 'chag sar zhugs te bdud kyi stobs kyi shugs kyi cho 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlab pa de lta bu byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-17: gang gis drang srong skra ma la dga' ba de nas song nas ring po ma lon par drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der bdud kyi gnas de nas nam mkha' las rdo'i char ba me rab tu 'bar ba'i char mngon par rab tu dbab par brtsams te klu thams cad thal bar rlag par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus der me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu phab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342a-19: klu thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-1: kye bdud kyi bu mo dag khyod ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-2: dzambu'i gling der dge sbyong goo ta ma la klu gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang 'di sdug bsngal mang pos gnod par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-3: gang dag 'dir 'khod nas dge sbyong goo ta ma la skyabs su dong ba rang gi bu mo khyed la lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-4: bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-5: sangs rgyas skyabs su sems can su 'gro ba; ;bdud rnams bye bas gsad par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-6: tshul khrims nyams shing blo ni 'khrugs zin kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-7: de ni nges par skye ba'i pha rol 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-8: ston pa la ni me tog gcig gtor zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-9: byang chub smon lam brtan po bskyed pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-10: de ni bdud rnams du mas gsang mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-11: nem nur med par 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-12: de yi bslab pa'i gzhi ni gcig blangs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-13: tshig gi don gcig tsam yang nyan byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-14: byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-15: sems can kha lo sgyur 'gyur nem nur med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-16: yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs rgyas kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-17: der ni me tog char ba sna tshogs 'bebs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-18: sangs rgyas yul gcig gis ni khyod la bsngos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-19: der ni ci yang nus par ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-20: gang gis sems can de dag sdig zad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-21: bdag cag gi ni las kyi sgrib 'byang ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-22: ched du lung bstan pa ni der nyan pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:342b-23: rig pa gcig kyang der ni ston pas gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343a-0: de nas bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing gshe ste sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde @343a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343a-1: ba skyes nas mya ngan gyi khang par gcig pu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343a-2: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa'i gtam gyi tha mar mjug thogs su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der phyin te 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343a-3: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343a-6: bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343a-7: gzungs sngags kyi gzhi de dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343a-8: sngon bdag cag gnyis bram ze'i khye'u gnyis su gyur pa na lus kyi slad du rgyal po rgyal gyi lha la nongs pa bgyis pas 'gum pa la thug ste btson rar stsal nas zla ba phyed zas dang bral zhing bcing ba lngas bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa mand'a ra ba'i bsung la yid la gzhan mi sems par gsol ba btab pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343a-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mand'a ra ba'i bsung bdag cag la thugs brtse bas rang gi gnas kyi shul kar bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lung bstan pa de lta bus bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bstan to /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-0: sangs @343b rgyas kyi mthus btson ra der bdag cag gi rna lam du don dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-1: tshig 'bru dang bcas par grags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-2: gsang sngags yid la bgyid pa de dag gis bdag cag dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-3: dad pa yang dag par bskyed nas de'i tshe bdag cag gi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-4: skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-5: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-6: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-7: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-9: sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-10: sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-12: longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-13: tshe'i 'du byed pas pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-14: bsam bzhin du srid par skye ba'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su 'gro ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-16: der bdag cag bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags thos pa tsam gyi mod la mgrin pa 'ching ba lnga las grol te btson ra nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thob par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-17: de nas nam mkha' la chas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mand'a ra ba'i bsung gi thad du nye bar phyin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:343b-18: de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri bo'i 'od ces bgyi bar skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi mdog gi thad du rab tu byung nas zhes bgyi ba nas slan chad bskal @344a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-1: pa dpag tu ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston pa rnams su bdag cag ma skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-3: de bzhin du da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du 'di dang 'og min la thug pa'i bar gyis thams cad sems can mi dang mi ma lags pa dpag tu ma mchis pas khyab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-6: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-8: sems can gyi sgrib pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-9: zhes bgyi ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su las yongs su ma dag pa dag gis bsgribs te mchis par mi nus pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-11: sems can gyi las kyi gzungs sngags thos ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-12: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-13: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-14: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-16: sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-17: sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-19: longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-20: dge bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344a-21: thos ma thag tu skye ba'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa mchis pa thams @344b cad yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-1: chos bstan pa des sems can rnams bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-2: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-3: ji srid 'tsho ba'i mtha'i bar du der 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas sems can rnams ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du srid par skye ba len par rdo thogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-4: tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-5: rtag par rgyun du brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-6: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-7: log par mi ltung ba'i chos can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-8: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-9: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la mngon par brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-11: dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-12: bsam gtan gyis rnam par rol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-14: tshangs pa'i gnas bsgom pa la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-15: 'gro ba thams cad du bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du ches de dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-16: bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags de legs par bshad par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:344b-19: gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345a-1: ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345a-4: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can su la la theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'dod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345a-5: myur du theg pa de yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345a-6: sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par 'dod pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345a-7: thos pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'dod pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345a-10: yid kyi gnas ngan len thams cad las yongs su thar par 'dod pa yin; bstan pa srung bar 'dod pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345a-13: bza' ba dang btung ba mang po 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345a-21: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'dod pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345a-25: yid kyis kun tu gnon par 'dod pa yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345a-28: gzugs med pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345a-32: bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub par 'dod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-0: de ltar yang las kyi sgrib @345b pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-1: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas cher 'phangs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnams kyis bsam bzhin du srid par skye ba blangs pa de'i bar gyis myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu de dag sgrub par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-2: las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu de dag gis zin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-3: gang zag de khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-4: kha zas gtsang ma dang mal gtsang ma der skyil mo krung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-6: rjes su mthun pa'i tshes brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs yid la byed pas gzhan yid la mi sems par zhes bya ba nas las gzhan mi byed cing sems rnam par g-yengs pa ma yin pa'i bar gyis re zhig mtshan gcig gam zhes bya ba nas mtshan bdun gyi bar du gnas par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-7: des rang gi sku byad du sangs rgyas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-9: gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs chung ngur rtog par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-10: chung ngu kho nar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-11: yad na tshad med par rtog par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-12: gzugs kyi sku tshad med pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-13: des mtshan thog thag mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:345b-14: mtshan gang las kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba'i mtshan gcig po de nyid la yid kyis rjes su bltas nas gsang sngags 'di dag brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-2: sna ba pha ra aa nud ta th'a t'a bh'u ta ko ti bi dzri mabha sv'ah'a //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-3: ji srid du kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rnam par sbel nas de dag byung ste rang gi mgo'i spyi bor zhugs pa de srid du des mtshan gcig la rnam par mig g-yeng ba'i yid kyis rjes su bltas nas tshig 'di dag brjod cing mi skrag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-5: rang gi lus la mar rnam par blta bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-7: des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-8: nying lag thams cad du 'gro ba mthong nas rang gi lus thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-9: zhes bya ba nas thal ba bzhin du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-11: phyogs bzhir rlung gis ma lus par khyer ba stong pa bzhin du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-12: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste; phyogs thams cad du de la gzugs snang ba gang yang mi 'byung ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-13: de'i thams cad sgrub pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-15: su la la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu'i bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa'i gzungs sngags shin tu bsgoms shing mchod sbyin legs par byas la shin tu yid la byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-16: de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-17: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-18: chos kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba nas ma lus pa'i bar du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346a-19: mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-0: dam pa'i chos spangs pa rnams @346b dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-1: 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-3: de 'dod na de ltar nyin mtshan gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-4: phyi rol ba'i bstan bcos thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-5: rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-6: gzhan yang gang dag snyan dngags su byas pa rnams des the tshom med par shin tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-7: de nyin mtshan gcig gis bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-8: gong ma rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-9: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-10: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-11: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgoms par 'dod na des shin tu bsgoms pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-12: de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i 'chi 'pho dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-14: sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-15: de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad rang gi lus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-19: sred med kyi bu'i bar ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-20: dbang phyug chen po'i bar ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-25: sa'i bar gyis gang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-26: de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad me tog gi bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:346b-27: rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-0: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi @347a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-1: bar dag gis gang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-2: sus bzhi ba rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu shin tu bsgoms pa yin zhing shin tu 'dris par byas la shin tu yid la byas pa yin pa de'i las tshad med pa de lta bu ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-3: de de ltar bsod nams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-10: mngon par shes pa tshad med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-11: des de ltar gang yang rung ba dag yongs su rdzogs par byas na myur du 'khor ba las rnam par thar par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-12: mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-13: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-14: 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-16: de lta yin yang mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-17: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-18: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa de'ang bdun phrag bdun du bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di 'dir ji ltar bstan pa bzhin sgom par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-19: bdun phrag bdun po de 'das nas las kyi sgrib pa sum cham zad cing lhag ma skyon med par ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro; ;bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa de lta bu de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347a-20: de ltar don che ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-0: su la la bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs @347b rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di de ltar thos pa tsam rna lam du thos pa de la mi'am mi ma yin pa'i bar de nye bar brtags nas dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-3: de btson ra'i 'ching ba dam po las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-4: gang su dag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyang sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-5: longs spyod kyi sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-16: rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba nas bran gyi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-17: ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-19: su sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta ba thos pa tsam rna lam du grags na de la nye bar rtags nas dad pa skyes de ltar don che zhing phan yon che ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-20: su ji ltar bstan pa bzhin de bzhin du sgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-21: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dkrigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-22: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-23: ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang yang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:347b-24: da'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-0: @348a *// sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-1: de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-2: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-3: 'bras bu dang po la gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-5: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-6: de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon ma bskyed pa'i sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-8: mun bral ma la sogs pa'i bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud kyi gnas su 'khod bzhin sems yongs su sbyang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i lung bstan pa 'di thams cad thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-9: thos nas kyang bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa nyid thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-10: gang dag sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-11: ji skad bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348a-12: de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas tshangs pa chen po re re yang bye ba brgya stong phrag mang pos yongs su bskor cing bye pa brgya phrag mang pos mdun gyis bltas te sil snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-0: pheg rdob pa bye ba brgya phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas de dag bdud kyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bkod pa nas @348b bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du babs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-1: bcom ldan 'das de la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-8: rin po che'i ras bcos pu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-9: chos gos sna tshogs gtor cing mngon par gtor te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-10: 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-11: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-14: lag 'gro'i tshogs thams cad kyi zhal ta byos shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-15: nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi dus lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-19: gang khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-22: gang de bzhin gshegs pas lag 'gro'i las bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byang ba lung bstan pa bshad pa rab tu bstan pa'i dus yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:348b-23: yang de'i tshe lha thams cad ces bya ba nas grul bum thams cad ces bya ba'i bar dag me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349a-6: ba dan gyi char pa dag rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi ril mo'i sgra 'byin pa la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i yon tan gyis bstod nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las mngon par bzhengs te ri'i rgyal po ri rab ga la bar byang phyogs su nye bar gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349a-8: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang gang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par bzhed par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349a-9: de ltar rig nas mi mdzed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349a-10: lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog bkram pa'i them skas sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349a-11: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349a-12: lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir dzambu'i chu bo'i gser gyi them skas tsandan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa dag sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-0: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas rnams las gshegs @349b par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-1: lha'i bu 'phrul dags kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi gser gyi them skas tsandan sa mchog sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-2: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-3: lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi bee d'urya'i them skas dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsandan gyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-4: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-5: lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi bee d'urya'i them skas lha rdzas kyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-6: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-7: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir mu tig dmar po'i them skas lha rdzas kyi tsandan gyi phye ma sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-8: rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-9: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-10: rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi rin po che rdo'i snying po las byas pa lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyis rab tu khebs pa'i them skas de nyid sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:349b-11: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-0: lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi @350a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-1: 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi spug gi them skas kyi lha rdzas gser gyi phye ma sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa de nyid du sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-2: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la thugs brtse nas bdag nyid 'dun pas bdag dang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku drug sprul nas sangs rgyas bdun po de dag lha'i dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-4: lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi mdun du nyan thos kyis mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po de lta bus ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-5: sangs rgyas bdun po de dag mchog tu lhan ne lhang nger ri rab kyi rtse mo na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-6: sangs rgyas kyi sku re re las 'od zer 'di lta bu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-8: zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag stong shar ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-9: klu gang dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis de mthong nas ltad mor gyur te gcig la gcig dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-10: snang ba chen po'i nang na brten ba ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa bdun po de dag gi las 'ongs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-12: nye dga' gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350a-13: ri rab rtse la lha rnams lhan cig tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa 'di gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-0: kun mchog lha yi dbang phyug shin tu @350b mkhas pa rnams kyi rig pa'i pha rol phyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-1: bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis ni longs spyod byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-2: 'ching ba rnams las thar bar byed kyi kun kyang de la mgo bos phyag 'tshol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-3: ma dros pas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-4: de 'di ma yin 'di bdud sdig can 'gro gtso 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-5: khyed la snying brtse ba yis bu dang skye bos yongs bskor 'di ni gnas pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-6: 'di ni gang zhig la la 'dod khams sdug bsngal bkres shing skom pa'i nad kyis 'jigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-7: sems can de yang rab tu thar byed khyed cag myur du sdug bsngal rnams las thar par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-8: sa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-9: de lta ma yin 'dir rgyal lha dbang 'thab bral dga' ldan 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-10: de dag khyod la snying brtse ba yis ri la gnas shing klu yi tshogs la lta //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-11: bdag cag yongs su skyo bas zhes kun gyis gsang mthor de dag la ni 'dod bos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-12: de dag rtag tu bde dang ldan pas khyed cag btson ra dag nas zhi bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-14: de dag ma yin 'di ni lha dbang brgya byin tshogs bcas gzi brjid lhang nge ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-15: de ni gling bzhi'i nang na chos dang ldan pa su yod brtse ba'i yid kyis blta //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:350b-16: khyed cag thams cad byams pa'i yid du gyis la khro ba myur du dor bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-0: de yis myur du lag 'gro thar byed 'di nas 'jigs pa kun nas thar @351a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-2: shin tu brtan gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-3: de lta ma yin 'di kun gzugs brten lha tshogs bsam gtan bde ldan gzi brjid can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-4: sems can rnams kyi ched du drang srong 'dir 'dzegs 'khod nas brtse bas phyogs rnams su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-5: myur du srog chags rnams kyi 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi byed chos chu'i char ba 'bebs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-6: lha yi yid kyis thams cad de la phyag 'tshol 'di nas bdag cag thar par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-7: klu lus 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-8: 'di ni gzugs na brten pa'i lha min bzhi po 'di kun bdud gyi 'byor pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-9: lus ngan skye mchog bdud rtsi'i skom dang rgyu bar btags pa 'di dag gnas pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-10: gnod sbyin sde dang bcas pas yongs bskor phyogs bzhi skyong byed sdig pa'i skye bo sgrol; ;de dag gis ni bdag cag sems can gzhan mthong 'di ni myur du thar par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-11: klu rin chen skyong gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-12: de dag ma yin de ni mgo bregs dur smrig gos can 'khong par snang ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-13: de dag la ni kun lta thal mo sbyar 'khod skar ma'i nang na zla ba bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-14: bdun po de dag cher bsgrubs brtul zhugs brtan pa mgo bregs dag gis mthong ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-15: dur smrig gos bgos mtshan gyis rab brgyan 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os par mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351a-16: klu lus 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-0: 'di ni bdag @351b nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten 'dren pa yin te nga la de ltar snang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-1: sems can rnams kyi mnyam gnyen 'gro ba skyob pa sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sel byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-2: gang dag lhan cig snang ba drang srong gzhan rnams kyang ni de yis sprul pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-3: bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas khyed cag sdug bsngal rnams las thar par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo de la bzhugs ma thag tu ri rab dpag tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 'khor brgya stong yod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-5: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-6: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'og min gyi lha'i gnas la thug pa'i bar man chad sna tshogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-8: dpag tshad brgya stong du mar spras pa de srid cig sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-10: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-18: me tog sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan par sprul pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-19: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bos te bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-21: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-25: nyan thos chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:351b-28: dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-3: mi ma yin pa rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-4: de bzhin du da ltar ri rab 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis shin tu longs spyad zin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-6: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-7: lha dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-8: ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i 'byung po khyed la phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-10: gal te bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-11: bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-13: ri rab la longs spyad par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad na gal te yang gang su dag bdud dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-20: lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-21: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-24: sems can dbang che bar grags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-25: dbang che bar grags pa lha'i drang srong gi bar zhes bgyi ba nas mi'i drang srong gi bar de dag thams cad 'dir lhags par gyur na 'dir bdag cag la shas cher phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352a-27: der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas 'dzum pa mdzad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-0: de'i zhal @352b gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-5: shel gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-6: 'od zer de dag gshegs nas bdud kyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-7: brgya byin gyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-8: tshangs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba nas lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-9: lha ma yin gyi gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-10: drang srong gi gnas bye ba phrag brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ji snyed pa thams cad du 'od zer de dag zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-11: de dang de dag tu sems can dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa bdud dam zhes bya ba nas drang srong rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du ming du btags pa de dang de dag thams cad la rab tu go bar mdzad nas bdud ces bya ba nas drang srong zhes bya ba'i bar de dang de dag de nas chas te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-12: sangs rgyas kyi sku drug po de dag ga la bar skad cig thang gcig yud tsam gcig gis 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa dag rgyun bcad nas bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-14: nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyi nang na ri rab 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-15: mchog dang phul yin par ngas bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:352b-17: 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyis longs spyod pa yin zhing ri rab thams cad kyi rgyal po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-0: de thos nas brgya byin koo shi ka dang zhes bya ba nas mi mjed kyi bdag po @353a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-1: tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i bar mchog tu yid bde ba dang rangs pa skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus klu'i rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten de nas song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-3: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-4: 'di nas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mjug mas 'dug nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-5: zhes bya ba nas klu'i rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-6: klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-7: byang phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-8: klu'i rgyal po zla ba la rtsub pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-9: shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mjug ma bzhag nas zhes bya ba nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-11: klu lhag ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-12: de nas 'dong bar ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-13: de dag thams cad kyis gsang bstod de 'di skad ces smas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-14: btso nar 'di nas bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-15: yongs su thar par mdzad par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-16: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353a-17: nye dga' gnyis bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo nas 'dir gshegs shing gnas rten 'dir bzhugs nas klu rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ro snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353b-0: de dag gnyis gnas rten nas ri rab @353b kyi rtse mo'i bar du de srid kyi rang gi lus sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353b-1: de nas brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353b-3: lus rtsub cing 'dus te reg nag dug pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil dag ral par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas des lag 'gro'i lus lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dag gis yongs su g-yogs shing mgo la tsandan sbrul gyi snying po dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas yongs su g-yogs te lha rdzas kyi me tog dag mngon par gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten de rgyar dpag tshang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353b-5: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas de'i dbus su lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353b-8: rin po che rnams kyi gdan dag bting ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353b-9: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo la bzhugs nas kun shes koo di n+yal bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353b-10: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du chud pa thams cad kyis thos par de la sangs rgyas kyi yul kyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs de lta bus chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353b-12: gang mig gi skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353b-15: nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:353b-19: srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354a-4: nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354a-8: srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354a-15: nye bar len pa nye bar zhi ba 'di ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354a-34: chos gang gis nga lha dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354a-35: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354a-38: lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye rgu'i 'jig rten na phul yin par grags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354a-39: byams pa chen pos mchog yin par grags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354a-40: snying rje chen pos dam pa yin par grags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354a-41: 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pas bla na med par grags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354a-44: yang dag par sdom pa rnams kyi sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par grags pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa dag dul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354a-45: yang dag par sdom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-1: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sgom pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i chos de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-2: ngas sems can thams cad la rgya cher bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-4: ston pa thugs brtse ba can phan par bzhed pas gang nyan thos rnams la mdzad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-6: da khyed cag gis bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-7: rga shi'i mthar dbyung ba'i phyir dgon pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-12: bas mtha'i gnas mal de dag tu phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur na mi rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-15: nged kyis rjes su bstan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya gang yin pa thams cad du gling bzhi pa re rer yang sems can dkrigs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po de dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-22: bzod pa rnams la rnam bar gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-23: de bzhin du chos rnams la chos kyi mig bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-25: sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams byang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-26: zhes bya ba nas kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:354b-29: kha cig gnod sbyin dbul bo nyid kyis bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-0: mi dbul po nyid du 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su @355a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-2: nad kyis btab pa rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-4: sems can rnams btson nas yongs su thar par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-6: dge bas na tshogs dri ma med pa'i gser can spyod pa rnam dag thugs rjes phyug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-7: lha dang shed las skyes dang lag 'gro'i dam pa nyon mongs rnyog pa sel mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-8: tshul khrims thos rig gsum po phun sum tshogs pa sems can thams cad 'dzud pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-9: lag 'gro'i tshogs rab thar mdzad thugs rje brtan po sngon gyi dam bcas dgongs par mdzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-10: gzhan sems sems can slad du sdug bsngal ji ltar btang ba bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-11: lag 'gro'i skad cig mtha' yas 'dir rmongs sdug bsngal sna tshogs thebs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-12: dgra yis phyag bgyis brtson brtan skye ba'i dgon pa las grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-13: ye shes chab kyis lag 'gro thams cad tshim par mdzad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-14: 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-15: ri rab la gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-16: 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355a-20: chos gos dag gi char rab tu 'bebs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-0: glu dbyangs dag gi rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa'i @355b lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-3: lha ma yin thams cad sdod pas ri rab kyi rtse mo nas gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-4: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten gyi dbus su gdan bting ba nyid la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-5: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' la lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-9: mi 'am ci thams cad kyis rgyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-12: rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-13: bcom ldan 'das la klu de dag gis kyang me tog sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-15: rin po che sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-19: rgyan sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-22: sug las gang dag gis sems can rnams klu'i gnas su skye lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:355b-25: las kyi sgrib pa bcus sems can 'byung bo rnams myur du klu'i skye gnas su skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356a-0: sems can gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson zhing bla na med pa'i theg @356a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356a-1: pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag yin la myur du 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs su lta ba ma yin zhing shin tu sbyin pa la mngon par brtson la lag pa brkyang ba dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356a-2: de dag smon lam gyi dbang gis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356a-7: yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol par byed cing shin tu nga rgyal gyis khengs pa dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356a-8: de dag nga rgyal gyis mthus rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356a-9: yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dag yod de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356a-11: de dag sha 'khon la brten pas 'chi ba'i dus tha mar klu rnams kyi nang du smon lam 'debs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356a-12: de dag smon lam gyis sher skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356b-0: yang sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang yang dag par ldan zhing snod du gyur pa'i sbyin gnas yongs su btsal ba dang mchod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag @356b yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356b-1: de dag rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356b-2: yang sems can gang dag ser sna can dang nga rgyal gyi skyon dang ldan pa dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356b-3: de dag las des klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356b-5: de dag las des klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356b-6: yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang pa dag yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356b-12: bla ma'i gnas lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356b-13: pha ma rnams la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang ba dag yin pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356b-14: de'i tshe de dag nga rgyal gyi rgyu dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-015:356b-18: yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang gti mug gis zil gyis non cing mdul la skyon med pa ma yin par spyod pa dag yod de /
